NK015(ba)027:0: sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i las rim gsal bar byed pa gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1: dpal che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)027:2: bsgyur ba khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor 'di nyams su len par byed pa la /
NK015(ba)027:6: sbyor ba sngon 'gro'i chos ni zhi ba dang mtshungs la /
NK015(ba)027:11: de la dang po dbang rdzogs nyams su len pa la /
NK015(ba)027:15: badga dang mtha'a yasa pa'i semas can rnams ni /
NK015(ba)027:16: ye gdod ma nasa sangas rgyas yina moda kyang ma
NK015(ba)027:17: rtogsa pa'i dabnga gis 'khora ba la 'khyams pa rnams
NK015(ba)027:18: / byang chuba mchoga sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du
NK015(ba)027:19: khro bo snang ba dam pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor
NK015(ba)027:21: gnyis pa dngos gzhi la ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK015(ba)027:22: dang po de bzhin nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK015(ba)027:23: e ma ces pa skye ba med pa la ngam /
NK015(ba)027:24: ngo matshara ces pa thams cad skyes pa la ngam /
NK015(ba)027:25: rmad kyis chosa ces pa skyes pa nyid nas skye ba med pa la ngam pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:26: de dag tshogs gnyis yang dag par rdzogas pa'i sasa
NK015(ba)027:27: rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gnag bya yin pas na
NK015(ba)027:28: gasnga ngam / chos nyid skye ba med pa yin
NK015(ba)027:29: pa lasa kun rdzob tu thamsa cad skyes pa ltar
NK015(ba)027:30: gasnga ngam / snang / skyes pa'i dus de nyid
NK015(ba)027:31: na'ang chos nyid skye ba meda pa las ma g.yos
NK015(ba)027:32: gasnga ngam / snang / pa ni / chos thams
NK015(ba)027:33: cad kyi gnas lugs de bzhin gnyid kyi ting nge
NK015(ba)027:34: gasnga ngam / snang / pa ni / 'dzin ces
NK015(ba)027:35: bya'o // gnyis pa kun tu snang gi ting nge
NK015(ba)027:36: gasnga ngam / snang / pa ni / 'dzin ces
NK015(ba)027:37: bya'o // 'dzin ni / de lar stong pa de
NK015(ba)027:38: bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor pa'i dgongs pa la raba
NK015(ba)027:39: tu gasla ba yul gyi mi 'phrogas pasa /
NK015(ba)027:40: gdangs 'gag med kyi rtsal las snying rje'i yul ni ma rtogs pa'i sems can ste /
NK015(ba)027:41: de rnams la snying rje bsgoma para bya ba yang
NK015(ba)027:42: yul sems gnyis su mi snang bar shar ba ni
NK015(ba)027:43: / kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK015(ba)027:44: gsum pa rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK015(ba)027:45: de ltar stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa'i rig
NK015(ba)027:46: pa h'u mthing nag gdang sol bcag pa'i mdog 'dra
NK015(ba)027:47: bar ngesa para snang ba de la ni rdo rje
NK015(ba)027:48: naga po rtse dgu pa khro zhal bcu drug dang
NK015(ba)027:49: ldan pa bskal pa'i me 'bar ba /
NK015(ba)027:50: he ru ka'i phyag mtshan yin pas che zhes bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:51: yang na nges pa la bzhi ste /
NK015(ba)027:52: kha dog nges pa mthing nag /
NK015(ba)027:55: phyag mtshan du nges pa rdo rje'o //
NK015(ba)027:56: rdo rje de lasa dapala chena kun bazanga he ru ka sku mdog mthing nag /
NK015(ba)027:60: zhing gshags pa'i sgo leb la rkang gis sgo srog byas pa /
NK015(ba)027:61: rnam thar brgyad chos nyid du shar ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:62: lha chen brgyad kyis nanga gi ka ba byas pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:63: sbal pa ser po brgyad kyis steng du zhing smug
NK015(ba)027:64: po brgyad kha phyir bltas la yang nas lags mgo
NK015(ba)027:65: thog tu byas nas ka ba'i dpal kha'i tshul du
NK015(ba)027:66: byas pa / nyon mongs ma spang ye shes su
NK015(ba)027:67: shar nas de nyid rgyan du snang ba'i rtags su
NK015(ba)027:68: byas pa / / klu chen brgyad kyis steng gi gdung ma bres pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:69: stod mi smad sbrul mjug dkyil du mdud nas mig
NK015(ba)027:70: mang ris su bris pa la phyag rgya dbal kha'i
NK015(ba)027:72: lhag pa'i ye shes cir yang 'char ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:73: gaza'a chena po brgyad kyisa kha bada lding ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:74: brtsigs pa'i thog gi pha gu ser po'i nang /
NK015(ba)027:75: 'dod snam dmar po'i steng du zhing gis ka thung nyer brgyad kyi sa bar /
NK015(ba)027:76: rus chen gyis kra rtse sbrel ba'i thog tu stod
NK015(ba)027:77: mi smad sbrul du yod pa brgyad mgo zung bzhir
NK015(ba)027:78: bsnol la mjug ma logs su bsnol /
NK015(ba)027:79: rgyu skar nyer brgyad kyis phyam rtsa /
NK015(ba)027:80: gnod sbyin nyer brgyad kyis phyam rtse byas pa /
NK015(ba)027:81: zhing chung gis dral drab byas pa /
NK015(ba)027:82: mam sa dang dri chen gyis thog 'dag byas pa /
NK015(ba)027:83: gsang sngags kyi sgras mi mthun pa thams cad dpa' bkong zhing gcig char ru gcod pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:84: rta bab gzhan zhi ba dang mthun pa /
NK015(ba)027:85: 'brug gis ri dwags kyis skan sgra sgrogsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:86: sprul pa'i 'phro 'du rgyun mi chad pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:87: ganma lcags kyi thog sera 'abba pa /
NK015(ba)027:88: thugs rig pa nyid bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:90: chos thams cad sku gsung thugs su ston pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:91: ba dana rtse gsum pasa brgyan pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:92: mda' yab mi'i gru tshug dang pus mo phan chad bsgrig pa'i sbrul nag gis sab srog /
NK015(ba)027:93: mi'i rgyu ma tshil chen gyis g.yos pa'i btsigs pa'i
NK015(ba)027:94: rtsa ba thod rlon gyis mnan pa la ni da
NK015(ba)027:95: ru kad kyis mda' yab ces bya /
NK015(ba)027:96: de'i nang na dpal chen po'i mda' yab ces bya ste /
NK015(ba)027:97: zhing bcu drug phyogs bzhi la bzhi bzhi de'i bar
NK015(ba)027:98: na zhing gis ba dan rtse gsum pas brgyan pa
NK015(ba)027:99: / sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs dang ma bral ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:101: lhag pa'i ye shes kun nas kun tu 'bar ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:102: ye shesa kyi me ri 'abra ba /
NK015(ba)027:103: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su 'char ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:105: thugs rje'i chags pa dang ma bral ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:107: dngos po thams cad sems su gsal ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:109: dug gsum gnas su dag pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:110: sbrul nag gi zu ra tshaga gisa brgyan pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:111: rgyu skar re re'i zhal nas sbrul gnyis gnyis bzung
NK015(ba)027:112: ba'i rnga ma gnyis kyi bar na zhing lag yod
NK015(ba)027:113: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / g.yas g.yon gyi sbrul mgo gnyis
NK015(ba)027:114: des tsit+ta re re bzung ba dang rgyu ma'i d+r+wa
NK015(ba)027:115: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / khugs so // yang na za
NK015(ba)027:116: ra tshag ni ka ba brgyad la sbrul gyis sag
NK015(ba)027:117: dar ris su dkris pa'i mgo rna ba phar tshur
NK015(ba)027:118: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / khugs so // la gdeng ba
NK015(ba)027:119: / rnga ma pus mo'i mgo la gdeng bar 'dod
NK015(ba)027:120: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / khugs so // la gdeng ba
NK015(ba)027:121: / do // thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
NK015(ba)027:122: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / khugs so // la gdeng ba
NK015(ba)027:123: / do // pa'i rtags su / nyi zla'i skar
NK015(ba)027:124: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / khugs so // la gdeng ba
NK015(ba)027:125: / do // pa'i rtags su / khung lding ba
NK015(ba)027:126: / rang byung ye shes la phyi nang ma grub
NK015(ba)027:127: pa'i d+r+wa phyed / khugs so // la gdeng ba
NK015(ba)027:128: / do // pa'i rtags su / khung lding ba
NK015(ba)027:129: / cing / thams cad ye shes 'ba' zhig tu
NK015(ba)027:131: gzhal yas khang la phyi dang nanga meda pa kun tu yang nang du gyur para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:132: de'i nang du lte ba zlum po chos dbyings shin
NK015(ba)027:133: tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes de nyid rnam
NK015(ba)027:134: thar gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:135: gru gsuma mthing nag zla gam damra po gsum dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)027:136: me long ye shes la sogs pa ye shes bzhir shar ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:137: de'i phyi rola 'khora lo sngon po rtsibsa bzhi la
NK015(ba)027:138: rang byung ye shes kun nas kun tu 'bar ba'i
NK015(ba)027:140: chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:141: rtsibsa machana nag mo rdo rje'i brag gisa gtamsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:142: ye shes bzhir shar ba'i dus su chos dbyings ye
NK015(ba)027:143: shes spros pa dang bral ba la ma g.yos pa'i
NK015(ba)027:144: rtags su // phyi rol rdo rje'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba /
NK015(ba)027:145: lhag pa'i ye shes kun nas kun tu rgyas pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:146: gru chada bzhi gdul bya'i ngo bo la ye shes bzhir shar ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:148: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa mthar phyin pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:149: gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa /
NK015(ba)027:152: bsdu dngos bzhis gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:153: de'i phyi rola lha snam nang ma sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)027:154: rnam par thar pa brgyad la brten te 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:155: rta bab them skas brgyad dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)027:156: bden gnyis dbyer med mi phyed pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:157: phra med ma dang dbang phyug ma'i gdan bar khyam phyi nang gisa brgyan pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:158: de nasa gadna btinga ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:159: dbus kyi gru gsuma la ru tra pho nag /
NK015(ba)027:161: lha chena po sngo skya kha sbub /
NK015(ba)027:162: mo dmar mo byi chings su bsnol ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:163: de'i steng du seng+ge brgyad kyis rin po che'i khri
NK015(ba)027:164: rkang gi bar du kha phyogs bzhir lta ba pho'i
NK015(ba)027:165: sog phrag mo'i nu ma nas bzung ba byung ngo
NK015(ba)027:166: // de ni seng+ge thams cad mi 'jigs pa bzhin
NK015(ba)027:167: du thugs mi 'jigs pa bzhis bdud bzhi tshar gcod
NK015(ba)027:168: pa'i rtags su badz+ra he ru ka'i gdan no //
NK015(ba)027:169: shar phyogsa kyi 'khora lo'i rtsibsa steng du dri za
NK015(ba)027:170: pho dkar po mo dmar ser de'i steng du ma
NK015(ba)027:171: he dmar skya brgyad kyi khri byung ngo //
NK015(ba)027:172: de ni ma he zho che nas grong khyer brgyag sos pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:173: sku stobs bcu'i sgo nas blangs dor dang bral ba'i
NK015(ba)027:174: theg pa chen po gnyis su med par skyong pa'i
NK015(ba)027:175: rtags su / b+hud+d+ha he ru ka'i gdan no //
NK015(ba)027:176: lho phyogsa kyis 'khora lo'i rtsibsa steng du grul buma
NK015(ba)027:177: pho sngo nag mo sngon po'i steng du gzig bargyad
NK015(ba)027:179: gzig ni ri mo thig ler byas pa nyid kyis mdzes pa dang 'dra bar /
NK015(ba)027:180: rin chen rigs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mtha'
NK015(ba)027:181: gnyis kyi spros pa dang bral bas 'gro ba'i re
NK015(ba)027:183: rat+na he ru ka'i gdan no //
NK015(ba)027:184: nub phyogsa kyi 'khora lo'i rtsibsa steng du srina po
NK015(ba)027:185: pho mo dmar nag de'i steng du stag brgyad kyi
NK015(ba)027:186: khri byung ngo // stag gi ri mo shad du gcod pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:187: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis chos spyi'i mtshan nyid stong zhing bdag med pa la ma chags /
NK015(ba)027:188: rang gi mtshan nyid mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba la ma zhen pas /
NK015(ba)027:189: gdul bya rnams tshoms su gcod nas 'dul ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:190: pad+ma he ru ka'i gdan no //
NK015(ba)027:191: byang phyogsa kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibsa steng du gnod sbyin
NK015(ba)027:192: pho mo ljang ser de'i steng du doma brgyad kyi
NK015(ba)027:193: khri byung ngo // de ni dom gyis dmigs nas
NK015(ba)027:194: gang gi thogs tu rgyug pa la bshol ba med
NK015(ba)027:195: khri byung ngo // pa ltar / bya ba grub
NK015(ba)027:196: pa'i ye shes kyis gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus la
NK015(ba)027:197: khri byung ngo // pa ltar / bab pa'i tshe
NK015(ba)027:198: / 'khor ba'i chos gang gis kyang mi bzlog cing
NK015(ba)027:200: karma he ru ka'i gdan no //
NK015(ba)027:202: de daga gi bar bar du rina po che'i khri'i steng du mu tig gi d+r+wa ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:203: de'i steng du skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su pad+ma dang /
NK015(ba)027:204: thabsa shes rab kyi rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:205: zla ba dang nyi ma'i gadna re re bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:206: rtsibsa machana bzhi gru chada bzhi dang brgyad la /
NK015(ba)027:207: zhing bsnol ma brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i gdan re re bsgom pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:208: gdul bya gdul byed 'brel ba'i dpang du steng 'og
NK015(ba)027:209: ma gtogs pa'i phyogs skyongs pho mo brgyad bsnol ba'o
NK015(ba)027:210: // lha snam la zhing rkyang pa brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma ni /
NK015(ba)027:211: gdul bya dang gdul byed 'brel ba'i ngos lha srin sde brgyad kyi gtso bo brgyad yin gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:212: sgo bzhira zhing rkyang pa bzhi'i steng du nyi ma ni /
NK015(ba)027:213: bdud bzhi tshar gcod pa'i gdan no //
NK015(ba)027:215: nang zhing tshala pa shar du drug /
NK015(ba)027:220: nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i tshal pa re re bsgom pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:221: dbang phyug ma rnams sbyor lam pas mi non pa'i phyir ro //
NK015(ba)027:222: de bas na mnyam bzhag dri ma can yin /
NK015(ba)027:223: de yang 'khor ba mtshon pa la zhing /
NK015(ba)027:224: 'das pa'i ye shes mtshon pa la nyi ma ste /
NK015(ba)027:225: de bas na mnyam bzhag la nges shes yod pa'i
NK015(ba)027:226: 'das ma 'das kyis sa mtshams yin pas gnyis ka
NK015(ba)027:229: / 'das ma 'das kyi sa mtshams la bshad srol mang yang /
NK015(ba)027:230: 'dir 'di ltar du bshad pa de 'thad par sems so //
NK015(ba)027:231: gong gi gtso bo'i gdan gyi sems can la 'dod
NK015(ba)027:232: gzhung mi 'dra ba kha kha nas mang du snang
NK015(ba)027:233: yang / 'dir bkod pa ni slob dpon pad+ma'i bzhed pa yin gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:234: de nas bdag gi sras su rgyal ba bskyed pa'i
NK015(ba)027:235: cho 'phrul rten pa lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ni
NK015(ba)027:236: / rnal 'byor badga nyid ni sangas rgyas thamsa cada kyi /
NK015(ba)027:237: sku gsung thugsa kyi rang bzhin dang bdag gi lus
NK015(ba)027:238: ngag yid gsum dbyer med pas na rdo rje'i badga
NK015(ba)027:239: po kun bzang che mchog he ru ka khro bo
NK015(ba)027:241: gsar du bsgom pa ma yin ye gdod ma nyid
NK015(ba)027:242: nasa sems nyid chos sku'i ngo bo la gzung 'dzin
NK015(ba)027:243: gyi dri mas gos pa mi snyed pas /
NK015(ba)027:245: de'i shugs kyis khro bo ni dpal chen che mchog he ru ka'i skur snang bas /
NK015(ba)027:246: khro tshul dang bcas pa'i khro ba'i cha lugs du
NK015(ba)027:247: ma dang ldan pa'i dgongs pa de bzhina nyid kyi
NK015(ba)027:248: dbyingsa lasa ni / rtags khro mo dabnga phyug mngona phyung te /
NK015(ba)027:250: bdag gi thugsa ka nas yum khro mo dabnga phyug ma sku mdoga mthinga naga zhal gciga phyag gnyis /
NK015(ba)027:252: g.yona pasa thoda khrag bsnamsa pa phyung la /
NK015(ba)027:253: yaba yum gnyis ma chagas thabsa kyis rol pa madzada pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:254: h'u h'u h'u sku gsung thugs gsum /
NK015(ba)027:261: phata phata phata gsum sgrol ba /
NK015(ba)027:262: ha la ha la ha la gsum chom shig /
NK015(ba)027:264: sku gsung thugs su snang ba phyi nang gi chos
NK015(ba)027:265: sna tshogs gnyis med ye shes su dag pa de
NK015(ba)027:266: nyid gdul bya'i ngo la khro bor snang ba /
NK015(ba)027:267: gdul bya gdul ba'i nus mthu stobs dang ldan pas bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba /
NK015(ba)027:268: de dag kyang gcig tsam gnyis tsam ma yin /
NK015(ba)027:269: khrag 'thung sum cu'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings kyi gar khyab pa khyab pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:270: des ci mdzad na sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas gdul bya rnams sgrol cig pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:272: khams gsum gyi dug gsum thams cad chom gcig pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:273: bcom nas ci byed na dbyings su sdud cig pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:278: phyag na stong khamas kyi rdul snyed kyi mtshona cha 'dzina para gyur ro //
NK015(ba)027:280: byang chub semas las kyang khro bo zhal phyag ngesa
NK015(ba)027:281: pa meda pa sku tshad stong gsum tsam lasa grangsa
NK015(ba)027:282: stong khamsa kyi rdul phra rab snyed 'thona te /
NK015(ba)027:283: gnas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na khyab ste /
NK015(ba)027:285: stong khamas kyi drag byed thams cad ni bsgral /
NK015(ba)027:286: semsa can thams cad kyi dona byas nasa slar phyogsa bcu nas tshur 'dus pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:287: 'bras bu'i khrag 'thung du bzhengsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:288: h'u h'u dbus kyi me long ye shes las byung
NK015(ba)027:289: ba'i khro tshogas rnams gciga tu 'dus pa lasa bdag
NK015(ba)027:291: badga nyid dbus su b+hud+d+ha khrag 'thunga sku mdoga smug naga ni /
NK015(ba)027:292: me long ye shes dbang drag gi las kyis gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:293: dbu gsum ni rnam thar gsum ste /
NK015(ba)027:294: dbus zhal smug po sku stong pa nyid /
NK015(ba)027:295: zhal gayasa dakara ba thugs smon pa med pa /
NK015(ba)027:296: g.yona zhal damra ba gsung mtshan ma med pa /
NK015(ba)027:297: gayasa kyi dang po na 'khora yug ni ye shes rang rtags ste /
NK015(ba)027:298: me long ye shes kyi gdul bya'i rgyud la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:299: bar ma na rdo rje ni /
NK015(ba)027:300: 'gags med du snang dus chos dbyings ye shes las mi 'gyur ba'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:301: tha ma na rala gri ni mnyam nyid ye shes kyis snang stong gi mtha' gnyis gcod pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:302: g.yon dang po na b+han+d+ha khrag gisa bakanga ba dbyings kyi phyag mtshan ste /
NK015(ba)027:303: b+han+d+ha dkar ba ni chos dbyings la nyon mongs gis ma gos pa'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:304: zlum pa ni spros pa dang bral ba'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:305: nang khrag gis gang ba ni ma rtogs pa'i khams gsum gyi gzung 'dzin no //
NK015(ba)027:306: so so rang rang gi phyag mtshan dang pos dkrugs pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:307: khams gsum gyi gzung 'dzin rig pa'i ye shes kyis sbyang ba'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:309: theg pa 'og ma bzhin du mi spangs ye shes
NK015(ba)027:310: kyi ngang du spyod pa'i rtags ste gtso bo lnga
NK015(ba)027:312: bar ma na dgra s+t+wa ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis mtha' gnyis gcod pa'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:313: tha ma na gshola shinga ni /
NK015(ba)027:314: gdul bya'i rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa tha rgod dang 'dra ba la /
NK015(ba)027:315: bya grub ye shes gshol dang 'dra bas bklog cing /
NK015(ba)027:316: dge ba'i lo thog bskyed par byed pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:317: phyag matshana de daga la me 'abra ba /
NK015(ba)027:318: yum b+hud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri ma sku mdoga smug nag /
NK015(ba)027:319: zhal gciga phyag gnyisa gayasa yab la 'khyud cinga /
NK015(ba)027:320: g.yona pas b+han+d+ha bsnamsa te yab la stobsa pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:321: h'u h'u shar phyogsa kyi chos dbyings ye shes las
NK015(ba)027:322: byung ba'i khro bo rnams gciga tu 'dus pa lasa
NK015(ba)027:323: / chos dbyings ye shes cis kyang mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:324: badz+ra khrag 'thung sku mdoga mthinga nag /
NK015(ba)027:328: phyag drug gi gayasa dang po na rdo rje /
NK015(ba)027:332: yum badz+ra kro ti shwa ri ma dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)027:333: h'u h'u lho phyogs kyi mnyam nyid ye shes las
NK015(ba)027:334: byung ba'i khro bo rnams gcig tu 'dus pa las
NK015(ba)027:335: / mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:336: rat+na khrag 'thung sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug /
NK015(ba)027:339: phyag g.yas dang po na ral gri /
NK015(ba)027:343: yum rat+na kro ti shwa ri ma dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)027:344: h'u h'u nub phyogsa kyi sora rtogs ye shes las
NK015(ba)027:345: byung ba'i khro bo rnams gciga tu 'dusa pa lasa
NK015(ba)027:346: / so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdu ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:347: pad+ma khrag 'thung sku mdoga dmar naga /
NK015(ba)027:348: zhal gsum phyag drug zhal gayasa dakara /
NK015(ba)027:350: phyag gayasa dang po na dgra s+t+wa /
NK015(ba)027:356: yum pad+ma kro ti shwa ri ma dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)027:357: h'u h'u byang phyogsa kyis bya grub ye shes las
NK015(ba)027:358: byung ba'i khro bo rnams gciga tu 'dus pa lasa
NK015(ba)027:359: / bya grub ye shes kyis gang la yang thogs pa med pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:360: karma khrag 'thung sku mdoga ljang nag /
NK015(ba)027:361: lnga ka la nag shas yod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:362: phrin las drag po'i las la mnga' mdzad pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:366: phyag gayasa dang po na gshol /
NK015(ba)027:372: yum karma kro ti shwa ri ma dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)027:373: yum rnams ni kun kyang sku mdog yab dang mthun pa /
NK015(ba)027:374: zhal gciga phyag gnyisa gayasa yab la 'khyud cinga /
NK015(ba)027:375: g.yona b+han+d+ha dmar chen gyis bkang ba yab la stobsa
NK015(ba)027:376: pa ni dbyings dang ye shes dbye med pa'i rtags
NK015(ba)027:377: su / so so'i sku la 'khril ba /
NK015(ba)027:378: yab yum kun la chasa chen po bcu drug dang ldan pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:380: dur khrod kyi chas brgyad do //
NK015(ba)027:381: dang po la mnab pa'i rgyan gsum /
NK015(ba)027:384: dang po sku stong glang chen ko rlon ni /
NK015(ba)027:385: theg pa mchog gi rgyan te /
NK015(ba)027:386: dpal chen po'i thugs kyi dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid
NK015(ba)027:387: la 'khor 'das kyi chos ma shong ba med pas
NK015(ba)027:388: / de'i ngang la gdul bya rnams skyong ba'i rgyan no //
NK015(ba)027:390: dpa' gtum za byed kyi rgyan te /
NK015(ba)027:391: stag rigs kyis dpa' ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:392: gzan la bab pa'i dus su gtum pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:393: za ba'i dus su sha rus mi phyed par za ba bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:394: dpal chen po'i thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rig pa'i
NK015(ba)027:395: ye shes kyis gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa rnams skad
NK015(ba)027:396: cig la 'jom pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas dpa'
NK015(ba)027:397: ba dang / gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe /
NK015(ba)027:398: mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang gis kyang bzlog tu med pa'i gtum pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:399: theg pa 'og ma bzhin du sgrib pa rnams rim gyis bsal rgyu med de /
NK015(ba)027:401: las nyon shes bya'i sgrib pa gsum dus gcig tu 'jom pas za ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:402: stag la ri mo mtshams su bcad nas shad du yod pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:403: gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus su nyung ngu ma yin
NK015(ba)027:404: par mang por mtshams su bcad pa'i rtags su stag
NK015(ba)027:405: sham mo // zhing gis g.yang gzhi ni /
NK015(ba)027:406: tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan te /
NK015(ba)027:407: shi nas ro la blang dor med pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:408: dpal chen pos gdul bya 'dul ba la ni 'dul mi 'dul gyis blangs dor med pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:409: mi ma shi'i bar la tshul khrims bcas zhig yod /
NK015(ba)027:410: shi ba dang tshul khrims dang bral ba bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:411: dpal gyi thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la skye
NK015(ba)027:412: 'jig ma grub tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs
NK015(ba)027:413: pa'i rtags so // byug pa'i rgyan gsum las /
NK015(ba)027:415: ra r+aa ga na chags pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:416: dgongs pa chos kyi sku dang mi phyed /
NK015(ba)027:417: thugs rje chos thams cad dang mi phyed de /
NK015(ba)027:418: de nyid mtha' gnyis dang bral bas ma chags pad+ma spyan gyis sa'o //
NK015(ba)027:420: mi shi ro bsregs thal bar sod nas ldang du med pa bzhin /
NK015(ba)027:421: thugs mnyam nyid kyi ngang la 'khor 'das kyi tha
NK015(ba)027:422: snyed rdul rtsam yang ma dmigs pas yi ge 'khor
NK015(ba)027:424: zhag ni rus pa'i dkyil na yod pa'i bcud mngon du 'byin pa ltar /
NK015(ba)027:425: chos thams cad kyi khong na gab pa'i don dam
NK015(ba)027:426: pa kun tu snang bas kun tu 'od kyi sa'o
NK015(ba)027:428: dbyings ye shes kyi rgyan ni /
NK015(ba)027:429: snyan gong g.yas na ye shes kyi rgyan nyi ma /
NK015(ba)027:430: g.yon na dbyings kyi rgyan zla ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:431: sku gsum lhun grub thod pa'i rgyan ni /
NK015(ba)027:432: dbu la skam po lnga ni chos sku ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:433: dpung pa la ra ri dang khral khrol sprul sku ste /
NK015(ba)027:434: la la na rus pa mngon pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:435: chos sku mngon du byas pa'i rtags /
NK015(ba)027:436: la la na sha 'byar ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:437: thugs rjes gdul bya dang yul gcig par rol ba'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:438: rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi
NK015(ba)027:439: phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa ni longs sku'i
NK015(ba)027:440: rgyan ste / dbang po rnam lnga dang skra dang khrag 'dzag pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:441: nyan thos ltar ma spangs pa'i 'khor ba'i 'dod yon lnga dang ma bral ba'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:442: dur khrod kyi rgyan brgyad ni /
NK015(ba)027:443: dur khrod brgyad la klu brgyad dbang che /
NK015(ba)027:444: de sku'i rgyan du byas pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:445: don ni tshogs brgyad rang byung ye shes su lhun gyi grub pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:446: rtags dur khrod kyis gdul bya pho mo rnams lngar bsdus pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:448: dbu dang skra la rgyal rigs dkar po /
NK015(ba)027:449: snyan cha la bram ze'i rigs ser po /
NK015(ba)027:450: phyag la rje rigs dmar po /
NK015(ba)027:451: zhabs la gdol rigs nag po'o //
NK015(ba)027:452: yab thabs 'gags med mtshon pa'i rdo rje'i gshog pa yod la /
NK015(ba)027:453: yum shes rab kyis rang bzhin yin pas gshog pa med do //
NK015(ba)027:454: sham thabs kyang shes rab kyis rgyan gzig gis sham thabs ste /
NK015(ba)027:455: thig le spros bral mtshon no //
NK015(ba)027:456: glang chen rko ba yang thig pa mchog gis rgyan
NK015(ba)027:457: ye shes kyi rtags yin pas 'dir mi mnga' gsungs
NK015(ba)027:458: / dus gsum gyi bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad dbyings su sgrol zhing 'dul ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:459: zhal gsum gadnga zhing skye bzhis sems can rnams rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:460: mche ba bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)027:461: yab kyis smin mtshams na khro gnyer bcu ni /
NK015(ba)027:465: rang byung ye shes kyis sa dgu la gnas pa'i
NK015(ba)027:466: sems can la dus gsum du gzigs pa'i rtags su
NK015(ba)027:468: 'gro drug gis sems can thams cad kyi skad dang /
NK015(ba)027:469: gsol ba 'debs pa thams cad mi gsan pa'i dus med pa'i rtags su snyan drug /
NK015(ba)027:470: srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi mgon mdzad pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:471: dbugs la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyis sprul pa rgyun du 'phro ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:473: ye shes drug gis 'gro drug gis don mdzad pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:474: phyag drug phyag mtshan dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)027:475: so so'i gadna la zhabsa bzhi brkyang bskum gyis tshul du bzhugs pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:477: gdul bya rnams kyi don ched du bgrod pa med par rang snang du mdzad pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:478: skye ba bzhi la gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad
NK015(ba)027:479: kyis 'khor ba ma stong gis bar du mi bsnyel
NK015(ba)027:482: thabs thugs rje chen pos 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:483: g.yas pa gcig brkyang mdzad kyang 'khor ba'i skyon gyi ma gos pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:485: 'gro don mdzad kyang chos kyi dbyings las dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:487: chos sku mnyam pa nyid bsnyen kyang mtha' la mi gnas pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:489: nang du rang byung gis ye shes 'bar ba'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:490: sku la bskal pa'i me ri 'abra ba /
NK015(ba)027:494: de gnyis mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i rtags su gyen du /
NK015(ba)027:495: chos sku spros pa dang bral ba'i rtags su zlum por 'khyil pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:496: thoda pa skam po'i phreng basa bcinga pa /
NK015(ba)027:497: 'abra ba'i gar dagu dang ldan pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:498: de yang rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas sgeg sgeg 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:499: bdud bzhi gdan du bting bas dpa' dpa' 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:500: sku che yan lag rags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:501: zhal g.yas dkar la gdang bas rgod rgod 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:502: zhal g.yon dmar la gdang bas gshe gshe 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:503: zhal dbus mthing la rngam pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:504: rgyu drug thugs rjes sgrol bas snying rje che che 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:505: dug gsum zhal du rngub bas rngam rngam 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:506: chos sku mtshan ma med pas zhi zhi 'dra //
NK015(ba)027:508: gnas kyis lha mo brgyad bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:509: yab yum gnyis med bde ba'i ye shes kyis dgyes pa'i /
NK015(ba)027:510: sngar khro bo 'chol ba'i dus su byang sems sprin dang 'dra ba lasa /
NK015(ba)027:511: ma mo'i tshogs rnams 'dir ha zhesa brjod pas ma
NK015(ba)027:512: mo brgyad rang rang gis tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dus
NK015(ba)027:513: nas ma mo chena mo brgyad bsgom pa ni slob
NK015(ba)027:515: yang na khro bo 'chol pa spro ba'i dus su
NK015(ba)027:516: byang sems gzugs su ma grub pa nam mkha' la
NK015(ba)027:517: sprin du gtib pa las ha zhes brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:518: ma mo brgyad du gyur par bsgom pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:519: cog ro sgom chung gis bzhed /
NK015(ba)027:520: yang na dgyes pa'i byang sems dwangs cha la rigs bzhi yab yum du gyur nas /
NK015(ba)027:521: 'dir 'bras bu'i khrag 'thung gis mkha' gsang gi byang
NK015(ba)027:522: sems kyi sprin snyigs ma'i tshul du ma mo chen
NK015(ba)027:523: mo brgyad so so'i 'khor tshogs dpag med du gyur
NK015(ba)027:524: te / dkyil 'khor du bkod pa ni pad+mas de bzhin bshad do //
NK015(ba)027:526: shar gyi rtsibsa machana la lha mo dakara mo ni koo r+ai ma ni /
NK015(ba)027:527: zhi ba'i las mdzad pa'i dkar mo zhes bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:528: dpal chen po'i thugs las snang ba'i mdzes ldan ma /
NK015(ba)027:529: thugs chos nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su sku mdoga sngon mo /
NK015(ba)027:530: nyer len lnga gnas su dag pa'i rtags su gayasa na zhing dbyug /
NK015(ba)027:531: gzung 'dzin ye shes su sbyar ba'i rtags su g.yona
NK015(ba)027:532: na b+han+d+ha kha mara chena gyis bkang ba gsola ba
NK015(ba)027:533: / bam bsnol ma'i gadna la bzhugas pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:534: lhor rkun mo ni tsoo r+ai ma ste /
NK015(ba)027:535: dpal chen po'i yon tan las /
NK015(ba)027:536: snang bas sku mdoga sera ma /
NK015(ba)027:537: phyag gnyis mad'a gzhu 'genga ste gtso bo'i thugsa kara
NK015(ba)027:538: gzir ba ni zhi gnas kyi gzhu la lhag mthong
NK015(ba)027:539: gi mda' sbyar bas bsgrub bya'i tshe dang gzi mdangs
NK015(ba)027:541: dpal chen po'i thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK015(ba)027:542: su bskyal bar mdzad pa'i rkun mo zhes bya ste
NK015(ba)027:543: / phrin las ni dbang gis las la mnga' mdzad do //
NK015(ba)027:544: nub tu rmongsa byed ma ni pra mo ha ste /
NK015(ba)027:545: dpal chen po'i gsungs las snang zhing mtha' gnyis dbang du sdud pa'i rtags su sku mdoga damra naga /
NK015(ba)027:546: gayasa na chu srin gyi rgyal matshana phyar ba ni
NK015(ba)027:547: chu srin gyis bzung shes la btang mi shes pa
NK015(ba)027:548: dang 'dra bar / dpal chen po'i thugs rjes 'gro
NK015(ba)027:549: ba bzung shes la btang mi shes pa nyid mtha'
NK015(ba)027:550: gnyis su ma nyams pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:551: g.yona b+han+d+ha damra chen gyis bkang ba gsola ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:554: byang phyogsa su brlag byed ma ni bit+ta li ste /
NK015(ba)027:555: dpal chen po'i phrin las la snang ste /
NK015(ba)027:556: las ci mdzad kyang drag po la mnga' mdzad pas sku mdoga mthing nag /
NK015(ba)027:557: gayasa rdo rje rtse dgu ni /
NK015(ba)027:558: gdul bya rnams chos nyid kyi ngang du 'jams par mdzad la /
NK015(ba)027:559: g.yona zhing chung ngu'i mgo nasa gsola ba'o ni /
NK015(ba)027:560: phung po lnga chos nyid du dag pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:561: shar lho'i gru chad la spos mo ni yon tan las snang ste /
NK015(ba)027:563: dbyings ye shes dbyer med kyi don gyis rgyas pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:565: rgyas pa'i las kyi thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:566: phyag g.yona pasa zhing bzunga nasa bsnams pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:568: gayasa kyis de'i rgyu ma zhagas para 'dren para ni /
NK015(ba)027:569: 'khor ba'i gnas nas rgyu drug 'dren ste thar pa'i lam la 'god pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:571: lho nub tu gtum mo ni g+hasma r+ai ste /
NK015(ba)027:572: dpal chen po'i gsung las snang bas /
NK015(ba)027:573: sku mdoga ljang nag ni gsung gi sgo nas phrin las ma mnga' brnyes pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:574: g.yon thod khrag gayasa rdo rje dkrugsa cing gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:575: dbyings ye shes kyi rtags te /
NK015(ba)027:576: khams gsum gdug pa can thams cad dkrugs cing dpal chen po'i zhal du stobs pa'i barda'o //
NK015(ba)027:577: nub byang du sme sha cana ni /
NK015(ba)027:578: dpal chen po'i thugs las snang bas sku mdoga nag mo /
NK015(ba)027:579: phyag gnyis kyi zhing gi khog pa nasa glo snying 'dren cing za ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:580: gzung 'dzin rtsad nas bcad pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:581: phrin las ni bzhi ka la dbang ngo //
NK015(ba)027:582: byang shar mtshamsa su ma tshogas ma ni tsan+da l+ai ste /
NK015(ba)027:583: dpal chen po'i phrin las las snang bas sku mdog mthinga skya ni /
NK015(ba)027:584: thugs chos nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:585: phyag gnyis kyi zhing gi mgo lus phral ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:586: khams gsum sems can gyi gzung 'dzin dag par byed pa'i rtags so /
NK015(ba)027:588: / 'di ni tshe'i ma mo yin pas /
NK015(ba)027:589: las ni rgyas pa la mnga' mdzad do //
NK015(ba)027:591: gdul bya dang mthun par zhing gisa rked chings dang /
NK015(ba)027:592: stag gi sham thabsa mang'a ba /
NK015(ba)027:593: pro ta a dza na ste mi'i rgyu ma'i phreng basa sku la dkris pa /
NK015(ba)027:594: zhag dang thal chena dang rak+ta'i thiga lesa sku la nges med du brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)027:595: dbu dang sku la thoda pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)027:596: klu chena po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)027:597: ral pa sil yan du yod pa /
NK015(ba)027:598: bskal pa'i me dpung 'abra ba'i dbus na zhing bsnol ma'i gadna la /
NK015(ba)027:599: dbyingsa las byung ba'i ngo matshara dang /
NK015(ba)027:600: dapala chen thugsa lasa byung ba'i ngo matshara dang /
NK015(ba)027:601: gdul bya 'dul ba'i ngo matshara gsum dang bcas nas bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:602: yul gyi lha mo brgyad bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:603: byang chub semsa kyi sprin lasa he zhes brjod pasa /
NK015(ba)027:604: mgo brnyan ma brgyad du gyur te /
NK015(ba)027:605: shar phyogsa su sing+ha ma sku mdoga sera mo ni /
NK015(ba)027:606: che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:609: thugs rig pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad chos
NK015(ba)027:610: kyi dbyings su 'joms shing rig pa skad cig ma
NK015(ba)027:611: 'bras bu la sbyor ba ni don /
NK015(ba)027:612: rtags ni gdul bya thams cad mi 'dul ba med pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:613: kha na ro za ba ni 'khor ba dang du len pa nyid chos nyid du rol ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:614: phyag gnyisa rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya bsnol nas ni yul sems gnyis sku gsung thugs su shar ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:615: zhabsa gnyis brgyad kyi 'dora thabsa kyis zhing brkyang ba'i gdan la bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:616: lho phyogsa su b+y+aa kri mu la sku mdoga dmar
NK015(ba)027:617: nag ni 'gro don rgyun du mdzad cing gdul bya'i
NK015(ba)027:619: stag gi mgo bo can ni dpal chen po'i thugs nyid rigs kyis dpa' ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:621: phrin las kyis za ba gsum gyi sgo nas 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:622: mdun na zhing la 'bru tshugasa su blta ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:623: thugs rjes 'khor ba la gzigs pas las gzhan du ma yengs pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:624: phyag gnyis rtse gcig gi phyag rgya bsnol ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:625: g.yas pa thugs rjes 'gro ba la gzigs pa las mi 'da' /
NK015(ba)027:626: g.yon pa ye shes kyis mya ngan las 'das pa la gzigs pa la mi 'da' ba'i don no //
NK015(ba)027:627: nub phyogsa su sri la mu kh+aa nag mo ni /
NK015(ba)027:628: dpal chen po'i gsung las sprul pa nyid chos nyid las mi 'gyur ba'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:629: wa'i mgo can ni dpal chen po'i gsung gi sprul pa nyid gdul bya'i don du shar ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:631: gdul bya gar yod thugs rje shar ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:632: wa mdzem la mkhas pa ltar /
NK015(ba)027:633: gdul bya'i don la spyod na yang skyon gyis mi gos pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:634: phyag gnyisa kyi zhing gi lpagsa pa thogsa nasa chu
NK015(ba)027:635: sera ldag pa'o ni gdul bya'i shes bya'i sgrib pa
NK015(ba)027:636: rkang dang dpri la gnas pa sbyang ba'i rtags so
NK015(ba)027:637: // byang phyogsa su shwa na mu kh+aa sku mdoga sngon mo ni /
NK015(ba)027:638: phrin las ci mdzad kyang dpal chen po'i thugs las mi g.yo ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:640: dpal chen po'i thugs kyi phrin las las grub pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:641: 'gro don mdzad pa'i tshe gang la yang bdam nges med la dang /
NK015(ba)027:642: spyang ku mi gnyid pa dang 'dra bar /
NK015(ba)027:643: phrin las kyis gzhan don mdzad pa la gshol ba med pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:644: phyag gnyis kyi zhing bzung nas khog pa bkral ste
NK015(ba)027:645: nang gi glo snying la blta ba'o ni zhing gis
NK015(ba)027:646: 'khor ba ste / 'khor ba'i gzung 'dzin gyi rten
NK015(ba)027:647: glo snying yin pa chos nyid du gzigs pa'i rtags
NK015(ba)027:648: 'khor ba ste / so // shar lhor krita mu
NK015(ba)027:649: kh+aa sku mdoga damra nag bya rgod kyi mgo can
NK015(ba)027:650: 'khor ba ste / so // ni / dpal chen
NK015(ba)027:651: po'i thugs nyid bya rgod mgo can du snang ste
NK015(ba)027:653: yang bya rgod ni tshul khrims chen mo zhes bya
NK015(ba)027:654: ste nub mo rmi lam nas god gar yod shes
NK015(ba)027:655: 'khor ba ste / so // ni / / / nang par de phyogs su 'gro /
NK015(ba)027:656: bya gzhan rnams kyang de'i rjes su 'brang /
NK015(ba)027:658: bya gzhan gyis bsang pa dang za nas /
NK015(ba)027:659: de'i lhag rol za ba'i tshul khrims chen mo zhes bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:660: dpe de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa yul la mi g.yo ba g.yo bar byed /
NK015(ba)027:661: yul dang 'phrad nas sgo lnga'i shes pa gcod /
NK015(ba)027:662: gzod yid kyi shes pas myong ba'o /
NK015(ba)027:664: / 'dir de gnas su dag pa'i rtags su bya rgod kyi mgor snang ngo //
NK015(ba)027:665: phyag gayasa gri guga ni ye shes /
NK015(ba)027:666: g.yona thod khrag bsnamsa po'o ni 'khor ba ye shes
NK015(ba)027:667: kyis 'khor ba'i gzung 'dzin rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags
NK015(ba)027:668: so // lho nub mtshams na kang+ka mu kh+aa ni
NK015(ba)027:669: dpal chen po'i thugs nyid lha mo kang+ga mar snang
NK015(ba)027:670: so // ste / sku mdoga snar mo ni sngo dmar ste chos sku mi 'gyur ba'i phyir sngo /
NK015(ba)027:671: thugs rjes gdul bya dbang du bsdu ba'i rtags su dmar /
NK015(ba)027:672: mgo dur bya ni dur bya'i skad bton nas zhabs kyi ro sa'i steng du thon pa bzhin /
NK015(ba)027:673: chos thams cad kyi khong na gang ba'i chos sku mngon du rtogs pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:674: phyag gnyisa kyi zhing phrag pa la khur ba'o ni /
NK015(ba)027:675: thugs rje gdul bya skad cig kyang mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
NK015(ba)027:676: nuba byang matshamas su kam k+aa mu kh+aa bya roga gi mgo can ni /
NK015(ba)027:677: bya rog gi tshe gsum dran te /
NK015(ba)027:678: dpal chen po'i thugs kyi dus gsum mnyam nyid du mkhyen pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:680: chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:681: phyag gayasa na gri bsnamas pa ni rig pa'i ye shes /
NK015(ba)027:682: g.yona na b+han+d+ha rgyu mas bakanga ba gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:683: 'khor ba'i chos nyon mongs pa khrag zhag dang 'dra
NK015(ba)027:684: ba mi spang cing ye shes kyis de'i rtsad nas
NK015(ba)027:685: gcod pa'o // kha na ro thegas pa'o ni gong dang mthun no //
NK015(ba)027:686: byang shara mtshamsa su hu ya mu kh+aa 'ug pa'i mgo can ni /
NK015(ba)027:687: 'ug pas mun pa la mig rno ba dang 'dra bar /
NK015(ba)027:688: dpal chen po'i ye shes kyis gdul bya phra ba'i phra ba'ang mi dmigs pa med pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:690: 'gro don du las sna tshogs shar ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:692: shes rab kyis chos dbyings 'dzin pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:693: g.yona b+han+d+ha glad khrag gisa bakanga ba gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:694: 'khor ba'i ngo bo de thugs rjes 'khor ba chos dbyings su 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:695: phra mena ma brgyad kyi rgyan dang cha lugasa ni /
NK015(ba)027:696: nang gi gnas kyi lha mo brgyad dang 'dra ba lasa /
NK015(ba)027:697: khyad para du bya bzhi'i sku la gshog pa skyes pa /
NK015(ba)027:698: 'khora yanga phra mena ma de 'dra ba'i tshogas kyis bskor ba /
NK015(ba)027:699: zhing rkyang gi gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:700: yang byang chub sems kyi sprin lasa phata ces brjod pasa /
NK015(ba)027:701: dkyil 'khora gyi sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:702: shar sgor rta gdonga lcagsa kyu ma ni /
NK015(ba)027:705: bar ma dor mi bsgyur ba de bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:706: dpal chen pos 'gro don mdzad pa rnams 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du mdzad pas rgyun ring /
NK015(ba)027:707: don mdzad pa'i tshe 'khor ba dang nyon mongs pa las gdul bya rnams brgal bas shugs che /
NK015(ba)027:708: tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas kyis sar sbyor bas bang mgyogs /
NK015(ba)027:709: gdul bya rnams 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du
NK015(ba)027:710: btang snyoms mi bzhag pas bar ma dor mi bsgyur
NK015(ba)027:711: de rta gdongs su snang ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:713: gdul bya'i don du ci mdzad kyang chos sku la mi g.yo ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:715: gdul bya'i don du sangs rgyas rnams spyan 'dren pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:717: g.yona b+han+d+ha damra chena gyis bakanga ba'i nang na rta
NK015(ba)027:718: mgo ljang ku byung ba'o ni gong dang mthun no
NK015(ba)027:719: // lho sgor phaga gdonga zhagsa pa ma ni /
NK015(ba)027:721: phag gis sa gdong tshugs su bklog pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)027:722: dpal chen pos 'gro don mdzad pa'i tshe /
NK015(ba)027:723: phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don gdong tshugs su mdzad pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:725: ser po yon tan rgyas pa /
NK015(ba)027:727: las ci mdzad kyang phrin las drag pos gzhi len pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:728: phyag gnyis kyi rgyu ma'i zhagsa pa bsnamsa pa'i rtse
NK015(ba)027:729: mo na phaga rgoda kyi mche bas matshana pa'o ni
NK015(ba)027:731: shes rab kyis mya ngan las 'das pa la 'debs pas 'khor 'das dbyer med du bcing pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:732: de nas bsgrub pa po la dam tshig ye shes gnyis med du bcing ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:733: nub sgor nyi zla lcagsa sgrogsa ma ni /
NK015(ba)027:735: sku mdoga damra mo ni mtha' gnyis dbang du sdud cing skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:736: phyag gnyis na lcagsa sgrogsa bsnamsa te mdo mig smin matshamas su yod de /
NK015(ba)027:737: de'i nang du 'jig rten spyi mthun la grub pa'i
NK015(ba)027:738: nyi zla ga'u'i nang na rnal 'byor pa'i tshe'i ngo
NK015(ba)027:739: bo a dkar po 'dzina pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:740: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la ye shes dam tshig dbyer med du bsgom pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:741: byang sgor dril bu ma ni ro lang sbyang gdong ma ste /
NK015(ba)027:742: dpal chen po'i thugs kyi shi nas thal bar song ba'ang slar 'tsho bar byed pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:744: sku mdoga ljang nag ni las sna tshogs la mnga' mdzad pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:745: phyag gayasa na dril bu bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:746: dril bu sgra mthar stong pa dang 'dra bar /
NK015(ba)027:747: chos thams cad chos sku stong pa nyid du mkhyen pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:748: g.yona na b+han+d+ha bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba'i nang na
NK015(ba)027:749: sangsa rgyas snang ba mtha' yasa kyi sku lte ba
NK015(ba)027:751: tshe'i ngo bo thal ba ba slar 'tsho ces pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:752: lha mo 'di bzhi ni dapala chas chen po bcu
NK015(ba)027:753: drug dang ldan te yum kro shwa ri ma dang
NK015(ba)027:754: 'dra ba'o // kun kyang zhing rkyang pa'i gdan la bzhugs te /
NK015(ba)027:755: ngo matshara gsum dang bcas nas rngam pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:756: shar sgo la sogs pa bzhir zhal phyir bltas te gnas so //
NK015(ba)027:757: de nasa yanga yab yum dgyes pa'i byang chub sems
NK015(ba)027:758: kyi sprin khro bo 'byung ba'i gzhi lasa phyogsa bcu
NK015(ba)027:759: nas byang sems kyi rang sgra las phata ces bsgragsa
NK015(ba)027:760: pasa / gtso 'khor thamsa cad kyang sngar nas khro
NK015(ba)027:761: bo'i cha byed du yod kyang slar khros te dper
NK015(ba)027:762: na damga chasa pa la rema rema byas pa dang
NK015(ba)027:763: 'dra bar shin tu yang khros par gyur to /
NK015(ba)027:765: / 'di yan chad kyis chos thams cad kyi ye nas sangs rgyas su gnas pa'i rtags so //
NK015(ba)027:766: gnyis pa ye nas yin yang rtogs dgos pas /
NK015(ba)027:767: rgyal ba'i sras su badga bskyed pa'i sgo nas dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul ni /
NK015(ba)027:769: ranga gi ngang tshul de bzung nas //
NK015(ba)027:770: bskul tshig 'di yanga rab tu brjod //
NK015(ba)027:772: ngo mtshar rmad kyis lha tshogs sum cu gsal ba yis /
NK015(ba)027:773: gtso bo'i sku la gnyis su gyur te /
NK015(ba)027:774: ces pas gtso bo'i thugs ka nas bdag nyid rig pa sgyu ma'am /
NK015(ba)027:775: srin po'i phru gu'i cha lugs su he ru ka chung ngu gcig 'thon ste /
NK015(ba)027:776: lha tshogs rnams la bskor ba len gsum du byas nas /
NK015(ba)027:777: shar phyogsa kyi sgor gshegsa te /
NK015(ba)027:779: ni ye shes lnga sngon dpal chen po'i khyod kyi
NK015(ba)027:780: lam la gnas pa'i dus su thugsa dam chen po
NK015(ba)027:782: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas ma lus kun na
NK015(ba)027:783: gnas pa'i sems can rnams mchoga nyid sangs rgyas kyi
NK015(ba)027:784: sar bsgrub bar sbyor bar khas blangs pas na /
NK015(ba)027:785: de bsad lta nyid du phyag rgya chen po dpal
NK015(ba)027:786: chen po'i sku gsung thugs su badga nyid sbyor cig
NK015(ba)027:787: ces bskul la gsol ba btab pas /
NK015(ba)027:788: yab yum sbyor ba'i byang sems ye shes su 'phros pa'am /
NK015(ba)027:789: yang na ram yam kham gsum spros te gtso bo'i
NK015(ba)027:790: thugsa ka nas 'od bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu
NK015(ba)027:791: byung bas / rang gi lus ngag yida gsum gyi bag chagsa thamsa cad bsreg /
NK015(ba)027:792: rlung byung nas gtor chu byung nas bkrus nas semsa
NK015(ba)027:793: rnam para daga pa gsera zhun ma lta bur gyur
NK015(ba)027:795: de ltar rang gi semas rnam par rtog pa'i lhad
NK015(ba)027:796: dang bral ba la chu la chu bur rdol ba'i
NK015(ba)027:797: tshul du / yi ge +aahmh'u gsum du snang la /
NK015(ba)027:799: a h'u la thim h'u mthing naga tu gyur te /
NK015(ba)027:800: de yan chad phyi dbang du 'dod pa yang snang /
NK015(ba)027:801: h'u nyid zla ba'i thog tu bzhag nas rlung gis
NK015(ba)027:802: bkyag nas lha rnams la g.yas bskor byas nas gtso
NK015(ba)027:803: bo'i thugsa kara thim pa ni nang gi dbang ngo
NK015(ba)027:804: // yab yum gnyis ma chagas thabsa kyis rol ba madzada pa'i sku'i dbyibs su brgyud /
NK015(ba)027:805: gsang ba rdo rje'i lam nasa byung /
NK015(ba)027:806: yum gyi gasnga ba'i mkha'a la bab pa ni gsang ba'i dabnga ngo //
NK015(ba)027:807: gtso bo yab yum byang chub semsa kyi 'od phung dakara damra 'dres pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:808: gtso bo yaba yum yang 'od du zhu nas byang chuba semas kyi 'od phung la thim /
NK015(ba)027:809: rigsa bzhi khrag 'thung rnams kyang h'u zhes brjod cing 'oda phung la thima /
NK015(ba)027:812: sgo ma bzhisa phata ces brjod cing thamsa cada kyang
NK015(ba)027:813: dbus kyi gadna thog tu 'od du zhu ba ni
NK015(ba)027:814: / bde ba chen po'i dabnga ngo /
NK015(ba)027:816: / 'od de yang mi dmigas pa stong pa nyid du
NK015(ba)027:817: gansa pa ni ye shes ranga gansa kyi dabnga ngo
NK015(ba)027:818: // spyi don gnyis pa khro bo gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lam mtshon byed la lnga las /
NK015(ba)027:819: dang po gtso bo bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul ni /
NK015(ba)027:820: rtogs pa'i chos nyid de ni de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:821: de ma rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad snying re rje snyam pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:822: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
NK015(ba)027:824: dran pa tsam gyis rig pa 'od phung las /
NK015(ba)027:825: dbus kyi gadna thoga tu h'u mthinga nag bsgril mar gansa pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:826: h'u de las h'u mthinga nag grangsa med pa phyogs bcur 'phros pasa /
NK015(ba)027:827: drag dal ni khu 'phang 'dril ba tsam /
NK015(ba)027:829: semsa can gyi ngaga gi sgrib pa sbyangsa /
NK015(ba)027:830: bder gshegsa gsung gi rgyud bskul /
NK015(ba)027:831: slar tshur 'dus pa las gzhi po'i h'u la thim pasa /
NK015(ba)027:832: 'od du zhu ba las thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje nag po rtse dgu pa dang b+han+d+hara gyur /
NK015(ba)027:833: de la phyag mtshan grangsa med pa 'phros pasa /
NK015(ba)027:834: drag ngal ni ser ba tsam /
NK015(ba)027:835: sgra ni seng+ge'i nge ro tsam /
NK015(ba)027:836: semsa can gyi yida kyi sgrib pa sbyang /
NK015(ba)027:837: bder gshegsa thugsa kyi rgyud bskul /
NK015(ba)027:839: gzhi po'i rdo rje dang b+han+d+hara thim /
NK015(ba)027:840: 'od du zhu ba las yaba yum gnyis kyi sku phra mo tshon gang bar gyur /
NK015(ba)027:841: de lasa sku grangsa med pa 'phros pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:842: drag dal ni thog 'bab pa lta bu /
NK015(ba)027:843: sgra ni 'brug stong ldir ba tsam /
NK015(ba)027:844: semsa can gyi lus kyi sgrib pa sbyangsa nas he ru ka'i skur gyur /
NK015(ba)027:845: bde bar gshegsa pa'i sku'i rgyud bskul nas /
NK015(ba)027:846: he ru ka'i skur bsgyur ste /
NK015(ba)027:847: sku de rnams tshur 'dus pas dbus kyi sku las thim pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:848: dapala khrag 'thung chen po'i sku yongs rdzogs su gyur te /
NK015(ba)027:849: sku mdoga mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)027:853: dbu rala pa khamas nag srid pa'i rtse mora gyen du 'khyil pa la /
NK015(ba)027:854: ral pa'i rtsa bar sbrul dang thod pa skam po
NK015(ba)027:855: lngas bcinga pa phyag drug gi gayasa dang po na
NK015(ba)027:856: rdo rje nag po rtse dagu pa g.yona dang po
NK015(ba)027:857: na dung chen khrag gisa bkang ba dkrug cing gsola
NK015(ba)027:858: ba / gayasa bar ma na stong gi 'jig rten 'khora yug /
NK015(ba)027:860: g.yona bar ma na dgra s+t+wa /
NK015(ba)027:862: sku la dapala chas bcu drug gisa brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)027:863: zhabsa bzhi brkyang bskum gyi tshul du bzhugs pa /
NK015(ba)027:864: bskal pa'i me ri 'abra ba'i klong na /
NK015(ba)027:865: 'abra ba'i gara dgu dang ldan te /
NK015(ba)027:866: dgyes shing ngo matshara gyi tshul du bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:867: yum badz+ra kro ti shwa ri ma zhal gciga phyag gnyis /
NK015(ba)027:868: gayasa pasa yab la 'khyud cing g.yona pasa dung chena khrag gi bakanga ba yab la stobsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:869: chasa chen po bcu drug gis brgyan ba la za byed gzig gi sham thabsa can /
NK015(ba)027:870: sku mdoga mthing nag 'jol sgeg gi tshul du yab la 'khril te bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:871: yab kyi thugsa kara tsit+ta rin po che zur brgyad
NK015(ba)027:872: dang ldan pa gur phub pa lta bu'i nang du
NK015(ba)027:873: / ye shes semsa dapa'a ranga 'dra ba gciga nyi ma'i dkyil 'khora la bzhugs para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:874: de'i thugsa kara nyi ma'i dkyil 'khora gyi steng du rdo rje nag po rtse dagu pa /
NK015(ba)027:875: de'i lte bar nyi ma la h'u mthinga nag gi
NK015(ba)027:876: tha mara ru lu 'bru brgyad kha doga mthing nag
NK015(ba)027:878: yum gyi thugas kara b+han+d+ha de'i nang du nyi ma'i
NK015(ba)027:879: steng du h'u mthing nag la ru lusa g.yona phyogsa
NK015(ba)027:880: su 'khora ro // gnyis pa dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul ni /
NK015(ba)027:883: thugs ka'i rdo rje bum pa'i h'u las 'od zer yig 'bru'i tshul du chad /
NK015(ba)027:884: ye shes sems dpa'i srog dag pa'i lam nas tshangs bug nas thon /
NK015(ba)027:885: de nas bdag he ru ka'i thugs ka nas thon ste /
NK015(ba)027:886: 'og min na sangs rgyas thams cad la phog dbang bskur cig par gsol ba gdab /
NK015(ba)027:887: sangs rgyas thams cad khrag 'thung rigs lnga'i rnam par 'dus te /
NK015(ba)027:888: mdun gyi nam mkha' nas khrus byed pa'am yang na sbyor ba mdzad de /
NK015(ba)027:889: byang sems dbu'i gnas lngar thim pa las /
NK015(ba)027:890: ye shes lnga mam h+aa chen po shun t+aa stong
NK015(ba)027:891: pa nyid dz+nya na ye shes badz+ra ni dbyer med
NK015(ba)027:892: pa'i rdo rje swa b+ha wa rnam par dag +aat+ma
NK015(ba)027:893: ko& ham ni / nga'am bdag yin ces so //
NK015(ba)027:894: don ni stong pa chen po'i ye shes dbyer med
NK015(ba)027:895: pa rnam par dag pa bdag yin ces nga rgyal
NK015(ba)027:896: bar bya'o // rtagsa spyi bora mi bskyod pa sku
NK015(ba)027:897: mdoga mthinga ka badz+ra he ru ka'i cha lugs su
NK015(ba)027:898: bar bya'o // bsgom mo // ma h+aa +aa dar+sha ni me long lta bu /
NK015(ba)027:899: dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko& ham ces
NK015(ba)027:900: don me long lta bu'i ye shes dbyer med pa
NK015(ba)027:901: rnam par dag pa bdag yin ces nga rgyal bar
NK015(ba)027:902: bya la / rtagsa dpral ba'i phyogsa su rnam para
NK015(ba)027:903: snang mdzad sku mdoga dakara po b+hud+d+ha he ru ka'i
NK015(ba)027:905: ma h+aa sa man+ta ni mnyam pa nyid /
NK015(ba)027:906: dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko& ham /
NK015(ba)027:907: ces don mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes chen po
NK015(ba)027:908: dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa bdag yin ces
NK015(ba)027:910: rtagsa ni rna ltag g.yas su rin chena 'byung ldan
NK015(ba)027:911: sku mdoga sera po rat+na he ru ka'i cha byad
NK015(ba)027:913: ma h+aa pra t+ya be k+sha na so sor rtogs pa /
NK015(ba)027:914: dz+nya na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko& ham /
NK015(ba)027:915: ces don so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes chen po
NK015(ba)027:916: dbyer med pa rnam bar dag pa bdag yin ces
NK015(ba)027:918: rtagsa la ltag pa'i gnas su snang ba mtha'a yasa
NK015(ba)027:919: sku mdoga damra po pad+ma he ru ka'i cha byad
NK015(ba)027:920: du bsgom mo // ma h+aa kri t+ya nush+thana ni bya ba grub pa /
NK015(ba)027:921: dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa +aat+ma ko& ham ces don
NK015(ba)027:922: ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes chen po dbyer
NK015(ba)027:923: med pa rnam par dag pa bdag yin ces nga
NK015(ba)027:925: rtagsa ni rna ltag g.yona pa'i steng du dona yod
NK015(ba)027:926: grub pa sku mdoga ljang ku karma he ru ka'i
NK015(ba)027:928: gsum pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul ni /
NK015(ba)027:929: bdag he ru ka'i spyi bo la zla ba'i steng du /
NK015(ba)027:931: thugs kar nyi ma la h'u /
NK015(ba)027:932: lte bar rin po chen la s+w+aa /
NK015(ba)027:934: de rnams yongs su gyur pa la sku yongs rdzogs su bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:935: ye shes lnga sarba thams cad /
NK015(ba)027:936: ta th+aa ga ta de bzhin gshegs pa ma h+aa chen po /
NK015(ba)027:939: swa b+h+aa wa rnam par dag pa /
NK015(ba)027:940: +aat+ma ko& ham bdag yin ces pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:941: bdag gis spyi bo'i nang du sku rdo rje b+hud+d+ha
NK015(ba)027:942: he ru ka sku mdoga dkar po gayasa na 'khora
NK015(ba)027:943: lo g.yona na dril bu bsnamsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:944: zla ba'i gadna la bzhugs par bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:945: de'i thugsa kar 'khora lo gyi matshana para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:946: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa w+aaka gsung badz+ra
NK015(ba)027:947: swa b+h+aa ba +aat+ma ko& ham ces bdag gis lce
NK015(ba)027:948: pad+ma 'adba brgyad kyi steng du gsung rdo rje pad+ma
NK015(ba)027:949: he ru ka sku mdoga damra po gayasa pad+ma g.yona
NK015(ba)027:951: de'i thugsa ka pad+ma am gis matshana para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:952: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa tsit+ta thugsa badz+ra
NK015(ba)027:953: swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko& ham ces bdag gi thugsa
NK015(ba)027:954: kara nyi ma'i steng du thugsa rdo rje badz+ra he
NK015(ba)027:955: ru ka sku mdoga sngon po gayasa rdo rje g.yona
NK015(ba)027:957: de'i thugsa kara rdo rje h'u gis matshana para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:958: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa
NK015(ba)027:959: ga na chagsa pa badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&
NK015(ba)027:960: ham ces / lte bar rin po chena zur brgyad pa'i steng du /
NK015(ba)027:961: chagas pa'i rdo rje rat+na he ru ka smu mdoga
NK015(ba)027:962: ser po gayasa na rin po che zur brgyad pa
NK015(ba)027:963: / g.yona na dril bu bsnamsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:964: de'i thugsa kara rina po che zur brgyad pasa matshana para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:965: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pu tsa mchod pa badz+ra swa b+h+aa b+aa +aat+ma ko& ham ces /
NK015(ba)027:966: gasnga gansa su chosa 'byung gru gsum gyi steng du
NK015(ba)027:967: mchod pa'i rdo rje karma he ru ka sku mdoga
NK015(ba)027:968: ljang ku / g.yas na ral gri /
NK015(ba)027:969: g.yona na dril bu bsnamsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:970: de'i thugsa kar rala gri ham gis matshana para bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:971: bzhi pa mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor spro ba'i cho 'phrul ni /
NK015(ba)027:972: yab kyis gasnga ba'i gansa su h'u las rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
NK015(ba)027:976: yum gyi gasnga ba'i gansa su pam lasa pad+ma damra
NK015(ba)027:977: po 'adba ma brgyad pa'i steng du gyis matshana pa
NK015(ba)027:978: / de gnyisa kyi bar du ma lasa nyi ma'i
NK015(ba)027:979: dkyil 'khora gyis ye shes kyi drod bskyed para bsgom
NK015(ba)027:980: / mo // k+te ta pa la hwam ni /
NK015(ba)027:981: yab kyis bskul ba'i glu ring po /
NK015(ba)027:983: yum gyis bskul ba'i glu thung ngu ni /
NK015(ba)027:984: ces yab yum gcig la gcig gis sbyor ba'i brdas bskul ba ste /
NK015(ba)027:985: de'ang phyogsa bcu'i sangas rgyas thamsa cad ranga gi zhal du zhugas /
NK015(ba)027:992: yab kyis brjod de yab kyis dus la bab ces pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:993: a nu r+aa ga ya ho /
NK015(ba)027:994: yum gyis brjod de chos kyi dbyings ni chags par bya ba'i yul lo ces so //
NK015(ba)027:995: a nu r+aa ga ya mi yab kyis brjod de bdag gis chags par bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:997: gasnga ba'i rdo rje lam nas yum gyi pad+ma'i mkha'a
NK015(ba)027:998: la b+h+r+aum dmar po gciga 'phros pa lasa dkyil 'khora
NK015(ba)027:999: du gyur te / bar 'khyamsa dang sgo gdan khri dang bacasa pa bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1000: de nasa yang byang chub semas kyi cha gnyisa pa lasa h'u bcu /
NK015(ba)027:1004: de rnams 'phros pasa so so'i gang na thoga tu bab pa lasa /
NK015(ba)027:1006: de rnams la h'um bcu lasa rigsa lnga yab yum bcu /
NK015(ba)027:1007: ha lasa nang gi lha mo brgyad /
NK015(ba)027:1008: he lasa phyi'i lha mo brgyad /
NK015(ba)027:1010: de rnams kyang sku mdoga dang phyag matshana rgyan dang
NK015(ba)027:1011: cha lugsa gadna khri dang bzhugs tshul rnams khro bo
NK015(ba)027:1012: rang bzhina gyis dkyil 'khora ltar bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1018: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bsgrad //
NK015(ba)027:1019: ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NK015(ba)027:1020: sprul dang thod rlon nyi zla bcas //
NK015(ba)027:1021: rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang //
NK015(ba)027:1023: ral gri dgra s+t+wa gshol la sogs //
NK015(ba)027:1024: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang //
NK015(ba)027:1026: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni //
NK015(ba)027:1027: koo r+ai b+han dmar zhing dbyug sngo //
NK015(ba)027:1028: tsoo r+ai mda' gzhu 'geng ma ser //
NK015(ba)027:1029: pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar //
NK015(ba)027:1030: bet+ta byis za rdor phyar nag /
NK015(ba)027:1033: sme sha mthing nag byis snying za //
NK015(ba)027:1034: tsan+da ser skya mgo lus phral //
NK015(ba)027:1035: sing+ha kha ro bsnol ser seng //
NK015(ba)027:1036: bya g+h+r+ai gnas lta bsnol mar stag /
NK015(ba)027:1037: sri la nag mo byis ldag wa //
NK015(ba)027:1038: shwa na 'dral lta mthing nag spyang //
NK015(ba)027:1041: k+aa ka kha ro b+ha na gri nag /
NK015(ba)027:1042: hu lu rdor dbyug sna tshogs 'ug /
NK015(ba)027:1043: rta gdong mthing ka lcags kyu 'dzin //
NK015(ba)027:1044: phag gdong ser mo mche zhags sdoms //
NK015(ba)027:1045: nyi zla lcags sgrogs me 'bar ma //
NK015(ba)027:1046: thal byed dril bu sna tshogas mdoga /
NK015(ba)027:1047: lnga pa gsang ba byang chub sems kyi mchod pa phul ba'i cho 'phrul ni /
NK015(ba)027:1048: yang byang chub sems las khams drug ga lha mor gyur te /
NK015(ba)027:1049: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rgyas par mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1050: h'u gzugs ni lag gnyis me long 'dzin //
NK015(ba)027:1051: gzugs mdzes spyod pa phyogs bcur g.yo //
NK015(ba)027:1052: shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar //
NK015(ba)027:1053: gzugs kyi lha mo spyan la thim //
NK015(ba)027:1055: sgra ni bde ba'i sgra snyan dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar //
NK015(ba)027:1056: sgra'i lha mo badz+ra dzi ka ra h+aum /
NK015(ba)027:1057: dri ni spos kyi kun tu dri'i badz+ra d+hu pe h'u /
NK015(ba)027:1058: ro ni bcud ldan shin tu ro'i lha badz+ra ne wi d+yee h'u /
NK015(ba)027:1059: reg ni mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba che /
NK015(ba)027:1061: chos ni snang stong shin tu chos kyi lha mo badz+ra d+harma d+hartu a /
NK015(ba)027:1062: ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK015(ba)027:1063: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)027:1064: ma h+aa b+ha ling+ta kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)027:1065: ma h+aa rak+ta la kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)027:1066: ces sman gtor rak+tasa kyang mchod do //
NK015(ba)027:1067: spyi don gsum pa rang bzhin lhun gyi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnyis /
NK015(ba)027:1068: dang po dbyings kyi khrag 'thung sum cu'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu 'don pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1069: ye shes lnga ldan rtsa ba'i sngags /
NK015(ba)027:1070: badz+ra rdo rje ma h+aa chen po sh+r+ai dpal he ru ka khrag 'thung ste bskyed pa'i sngags /
NK015(ba)027:1073: sarba thams cad dush+tana sdang bata ka gtog shig ha
NK015(ba)027:1074: na rgyob da ha chom pa tsa chos h'u h'u
NK015(ba)027:1077: am 'bru mthun ma h+aa chen po badz+ra rdo rje
NK015(ba)027:1078: d+h+aa r+aa gzungs ma h+aa chen po kro ti khro
NK015(ba)027:1079: mo shwa ri dbang phyug ma dz+wa la ni 'bar
NK015(ba)027:1080: ba h'u bsdus shig phata sgrol cig ni las sngags
NK015(ba)027:1081: te badz+ra khrag 'thung yab yum gyis sngags brjod pas
NK015(ba)027:1082: / sku chung ngu can las chen por gyur te mkha' gsang gi phyi rol tu thon nas /
NK015(ba)027:1084: sems can zhe sdang la gnas pa rnams tshar bcad /
NK015(ba)027:1087: ka tri sh+ya ho sa ma ya ho /
NK015(ba)027:1090: tshur yab drang yab dang yum drang yum la bstim mo //
NK015(ba)027:1092: sarba ta th+aa ga ta de bzhin gshegs pa /
NK015(ba)027:1093: ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma h+aa tsan+da sarba
NK015(ba)027:1094: dush+t+aan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa h'u h'u
NK015(ba)027:1095: h'u phata / sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa
NK015(ba)027:1096: kro d+he shwa ri sarba dush+t+aana sdang ba thams cad
NK015(ba)027:1097: h'u phata / h'u phata / ces b+hud+d+ha khrag 'thung
NK015(ba)027:1098: yab yum mkha' gsang nas phyi rol du spyan drangs
NK015(ba)027:1099: nas sems can gti mug can gyi don byas nas
NK015(ba)027:1100: h'u phata / h'u phata / / shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1101: rat+na rina po che ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka
NK015(ba)027:1102: ma h+aa tsan+ta sarba dush+t+aan+ta ka ha na da ha
NK015(ba)027:1103: pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK015(ba)027:1104: ma h+aa chena po s+aur+ya nyi ma rat+na rina po
NK015(ba)027:1105: che d+har gzungs ma ma h+aa chen po kro d+hi
NK015(ba)027:1106: khro mo shwa ri dbang phyug ma b+hi da ma
NK015(ba)027:1107: gdung h'u phata / ces rat+na he ru ka yab yum mkha' gsang nas spyan drangs nas /
NK015(ba)027:1108: sems can nga rgyal can gyi don byas nas lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1110: sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa tsan+da sarba dush+t+aan+ta ka
NK015(ba)027:1111: ha na da ha pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata
NK015(ba)027:1112: / h+r+aihgasunga gi sa bon sh+ru ta sa man+ta pad+ma'i gsung /
NK015(ba)027:1113: pad+ma ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai kh+aa hi gsola ciga /
NK015(ba)027:1114: h'u phata ces pad+ma he ru ka yab yum mkha'
NK015(ba)027:1115: gsang nas phyi rol du spyan drangs nas sems can
NK015(ba)027:1116: 'dod chags can gyi don byas nas /
NK015(ba)027:1117: nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1119: ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa tsan+da sarba
NK015(ba)027:1120: dush+t+aan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa h'u h'u
NK015(ba)027:1122: a mo g+ha don yod pa /
NK015(ba)027:1123: karma d+ha ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa ri /
NK015(ba)027:1124: bi shwa sna tshogs pa'i las /
NK015(ba)027:1126: ces karma he ru ka'i yab yum mkha' gsang nas phyi rol du spyan drangs nas /
NK015(ba)027:1127: sems can phrag dog can gyi don byas nas byang phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1128: ye shes lnga badz+ra ni rdo rje ste /
NK015(ba)027:1129: dbang rtags rdo rje rtse lnga pas dbu kun la brgyan pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1130: koo r+ai ha ni dkar mo /
NK015(ba)027:1131: badz+ra tsoo r+ai ha ni rkun mo /
NK015(ba)027:1132: badz+ra pra mo ha ni rmongs mo /
NK015(ba)027:1133: badz+ra bit+ta l+ai ha ni brlag byed ma dang bzhi po mkha' gsang nas 'thon te /
NK015(ba)027:1138: ces rtsibs mchan bzhi la bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1146: ma tshogs ma dang bzhi mkha' gsang nas 'thon te /
NK015(ba)027:1147: ka tri la sogs pa brjod pa sa gru chad bzhi la bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1149: badz+ra b+y+aa g+h+ri mu kh+aa he /
NK015(ba)027:1150: badz+ra sring+g+ha ya mu kh+aa he /
NK015(ba)027:1151: badz+ra shwa na mu kha he /
NK015(ba)027:1152: ces dbang rtags rdo rje lnga pa'i dbu rgyan pa'i /
NK015(ba)027:1153: khro mo'i lus la phra men seng+ge /
NK015(ba)027:1156: spyang ku'i gdong pa can rnams /
NK015(ba)027:1157: mkha' gsang nas spyan drangs te /
NK015(ba)027:1158: ka tri sh+ya la sogs pa brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1159: lha snam gyi phyogs bzhir bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1160: badz+ra g+r+ai d+ha mu kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)027:1162: badz+ra ka ka mu kh+aa he /
NK015(ba)027:1163: badz+ra u l+au ka mu kh+aa he /
NK015(ba)027:1167: 'ug pa'i gdong pa can gzhi mkha' gsang nas 'thon ste /
NK015(ba)027:1168: ka tri sh+ya la sogs pa brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1169: lha snam gyi mtshams bzhir bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1172: te dza te nga dza zhal chen lcags kyu /
NK015(ba)027:1173: badz+ra a mu kha h'u ni don yod zhags pa /
NK015(ba)027:1176: badz+ra b+hasmi b+ha la ba hu ho ni /
NK015(ba)027:1177: khams gsum slar 'tsho dril bu ma ste /
NK015(ba)027:1178: sgo ma bzhi mkha' gsang nas 'thon ste /
NK015(ba)027:1179: ka tri sh+ya ho la sogs pa brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1180: sgo bzhir zhal phyir gzigs nas bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)027:1181: de rnams thugs ye shes sems dpa' gsum brtsegs /
NK015(ba)027:1183: byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha lnga rnams 'dir sngags tsam gyis bskyed pa'am /
NK015(ba)027:1184: yang na tshar nas bskyed do //
NK015(ba)027:1185: gnyis pa rang bzhin lhun gyi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang phyug ma rnams bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1186: bar khyam gyi zhing tshal ba nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi steng du /
NK015(ba)027:1187: gtso bo'i thugs ka nas b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad las /
NK015(ba)027:1188: dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad yang /
NK015(ba)027:1189: rang rang gi sngags kyis lhag lhag bskyed de /
NK015(ba)027:1191: shar gyi ma drug bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1192: ma nu rak+sha si b+h+yo rdo rje srin mo kha
NK015(ba)027:1193: doga smug nag gayasa na b+han+d+ha rlon pa bsnamsa pa
NK015(ba)027:1195: srin po d+ha sha gri'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1198: tshangsa ma damra sera dabu bzhi sbrul gyi cod pan can /
NK015(ba)027:1199: gayasa pad+ma bsnamsa sba ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1200: 'dod khams gdung ba yongs su tshangs pas na tshangs pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:1203: re'u tri ma b+h+yo lha chen sku mdoga dkar ljang gayasa tri shul ba bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1206: b+ha na b+he b+h+yo gtog 'doda ma sngon mo gayasa 'khora lo bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1207: lha khyab 'jug chen po lha ma yin gyi gnas
NK015(ba)027:1208: su 'jug pa la srid para 'dod pas de'i chung
NK015(ba)027:1210: ku m+aa ri b+h+yo gzhona nu ma sku mdoga damra mo g.yas na mdung bsnams pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1211: lha ma h+aa de wa dang lha mo u ma
NK015(ba)027:1212: de wi gnyis la bu smin ma drug pa skyes
NK015(ba)027:1213: pa la ming gzhon nu ces btags pas /
NK015(ba)027:1216: in+d+ra ya ni b+h+yo bargya byin ma dkar mo /
NK015(ba)027:1217: gayasa rdo rje gdeng pa bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1218: brgya byin nye dbang lha'i tshogs la dbang byed pas na de'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1219: de drug ni ma ltar byamsa pa'i ma drug ces bya ste /
NK015(ba)027:1220: nye gansa bzhi las ma'i tshul 'dzina /
NK015(ba)027:1221: phrin lasa bzhi lasa zhi ba /
NK015(ba)027:1222: tshad med pa bzhi lasa byamsa pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1224: lho'i ma drug bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1226: sing+ha ka la b+h+yo rdo rje dmar mo sku mdoga damra mo /
NK015(ba)027:1227: gayasa thod khrag bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1228: lha kri shi ka dmar po de'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1230: a mri tam b+h+yo bdud rtsi ma dmar mo g.yas pad+ma bsnams pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1231: nyi ma'i ming gis rnam grangs la bdud rtsi ces btags pa de'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1233: so'u ni b+h+yo zhi ba mo dkar mo /
NK015(ba)027:1234: gayasa me tog pun+da ri ka bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1235: zla ba'i ming gis nang tshan la zhib ces btags de'i chud ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1237: ha na ha b+h+yoh be con ma ljang nag gayasa thod dbyug phyar ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1238: gza' spen pa'i phyag cha be con yin pa'i phyag mtshan la ming btags pa'i /
NK015(ba)027:1241: rak+sha s+ai b+h+yo srin mo damra mo gayasa thod khrag 'thung ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1242: gza' mig mar gyi gzhan 'jig par byed nus pas /
NK015(ba)027:1243: srin po skya ring phyag med zhes ming btags pas /
NK015(ba)027:1246: bak+sha s+ai b+h+yo za ba mo ljang nag gayasa rgyu zhagas bsnamsa pa /
NK015(ba)027:1247: dbang phyug chen po ma h+aa k+aa las lha min bsad nas za ba'i lha za byed ste /
NK015(ba)027:1249: de drug ni snying ltar brtse ba'i ma drug ces bya ste /
NK015(ba)027:1250: rnal 'byor pa la sring mo'i tshul 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1251: phrin las bzhi lasa rgyas pa /
NK015(ba)027:1253: nub kyi b+h+yo drug lasa ma mo drug bskyed pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:1255: ri tri ma b+h+yoh dag'a ba mo dmar mo phyag gayasa na mdung bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1256: rnam thos kyi bus sbyin pa byin pas /
NK015(ba)027:1257: de la 'gro ba rnams dga' ba'i lha dga' byed chen po de'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1259: re tri re ma ti b+h+yo khrag gisa myos ma sku mdog dakara mo /
NK015(ba)027:1260: gayasa na gshol bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1261: srin po stobs bzang ni dus rtag tu khrag la longs spyod pa'i /
NK015(ba)027:1264: e ka tsa ra ma b+h+yo gcig pur spyod ma
NK015(ba)027:1265: sku mdog sera mo gayasa na spu gri bsnamsa pa
NK015(ba)027:1266: ni / lha dri za zing gi ri ti pha'i
NK015(ba)027:1267: drin med par ma'i drin gcig pus 'tsho bas de'i
NK015(ba)027:1268: ni / chung ma'o // bzhi pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1269: ma h+aa ha ra ma b+h+yo 'doda pa ma damra mo phyag gayasa na mda' gzhu bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1270: 'dod khams kyi lha ma h+aa de wa gzugs shin tu mdzes pas 'dod lha de'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1272: si ti kam b+h+yo grub pa ma dkar mo gayasa na nor gyi bum pa bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1273: nor lha ar+ya dzam b+ha las nor dang rbod gtong 'grub par byed pas /
NK015(ba)027:1276: b+h+aa ya b+h+ya b+h+yoh rlung lha mo sku mdoga sngo
NK015(ba)027:1277: skya gayasa na ba dana lce brgyad bsnamsa pa ni
NK015(ba)027:1278: / rlung gis rgyal po be ji ram pa rlung
NK015(ba)027:1279: la dbang byed pas rlung lha sha ba'i mgo bo
NK015(ba)027:1281: rnal 'byor ma'i rnams ni dag'a ba madza'a ltar yida 'onga gi ma drug ces bya ste /
NK015(ba)027:1282: rnal 'byor ba'i nye gnas bzhi pa /
NK015(ba)027:1286: byang gi b+h+yo drug lasa ma mo drug bskyed pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1288: ma h+aa m+aa ra na b+h+yoh gsoda ma kha doga nag mo gayasa na ral gri bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1289: srin po gsod byed chen po ste /
NK015(ba)027:1290: lha gsod byed chen po'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1292: ag+ne ye b+h+yoh me mo sku mdoga damra mo gayasa na me sgron bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1293: 'byung ba me la blta zhing me la dbang bsgyur bas me lha'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1295: b+ha ra h+ai b+h+yoh phag mo kha doga nag mo
NK015(ba)027:1296: gayasa na phag rgod kyi mche ba'i zhagsa pa bsnamsa
NK015(ba)027:1297: pa ni / sa bdag phag mgo can gyi chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1299: tsa muna dri b+h+yoh rgan byed ma sku mdoga nag mo g.yas na zhing chung za ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1300: lha ma h+aa d+ae wa'i byad las sprul pas gshin rje rgan byed kyi chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1302: b+hu ta na b+h+yo sna chen mo sku mdoga dkar ljang gayasa na thod pa bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1303: bgegs byi na ya ka shin tu sna che bar sprul pas tshogs bdag glang sna'i chung ma'o //
NK015(ba)027:1305: p+aa ni badz+ra b+h+yo chu lha mo sku mdoga sngon mo /
NK015(ba)027:1306: gayasa na sbrul zhags bsnamsa pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1307: 'byung ba chu'i lhas phyi nang gi chu la dbang byed pas /
NK015(ba)027:1309: de drug ni btang snyomsa bran ltar bka'a nyan gyi ma mo drug ces bya ste /
NK015(ba)027:1310: nye gansa bzhi la bran mo'i cha 'dzina /
NK015(ba)027:1313: de ltar lha rnams phyogs kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du gsum gsum mo //
NK015(ba)027:1315: badz+ra ma h+aa k+aa l+ai b+h+yo rdo rje nag mo
NK015(ba)027:1316: sku mdoga nag mo gayasa lcagsa kyu bsnamsa pa ni
NK015(ba)027:1317: / lha nag po chen po shin tu mdog nag po yin la /
NK015(ba)027:1318: de'i chung ma nag mo khu byug mgo can no //
NK015(ba)027:1320: tsa k+aa la badz+ra b+h+yo shan pa mo sku mdoga
NK015(ba)027:1321: dmar ser phyag gayasa na zhagsa pa bsnamsa pa ni
NK015(ba)027:1322: / lhar gdong chen po'i chung ma bdud ra thod kyi bu mo yin pas ra mgo can no //
NK015(ba)027:1324: badz+ra bum pa ka ra na b+h+yoh rdo rje bum
NK015(ba)027:1325: rna mo sku mdoga dmar nag gayasa na lcagsa sgrogsa
NK015(ba)027:1326: bsnamsa pa ni / srin po bum rna ma'i chung ma seng+ge'i mgo can no //
NK015(ba)027:1328: badz+ra lam+b+ho d+ha ra na b+h+yo gsus 'dzina ma ljang nag g.yas dril bu bsnams pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1329: lha gsus 'dzin chen po'i chung ma kam ka'i mgo can no //
NK015(ba)027:1330: ma mo 'di bzhi'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK015(ba)027:1333: / 'di rnams kun gyi g.yona na b+han+d+ha damra chen gyis
NK015(ba)027:1334: bkang pa'i nanga na rdo rje rtse gsum pasa matshana
NK015(ba)027:1335: pa bsnams pa'am / yang na g.yas na rtags kyis phyag mtshan dang /
NK015(ba)027:1336: g.yon dbang rtags su rdo rje rtse gsum pa re re bsnams gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:1337: kun kyang zhing lpagsa kyis rked chingsa dang /
NK015(ba)027:1339: thod pa rlon pa'i phreng ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:1340: dara dang me tog gi coda pan dang /
NK015(ba)027:1341: rin po che sna tshogas kyi rgyan du byas pa /
NK015(ba)027:1343: zhing tshul ba'i gadna la zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1344: de rnams kyi thugs ka nas thod pa tshal pa b+h+yos matshana pa re re yoda do //
NK015(ba)027:1345: dbu la rdo rje rtse lnga re resa matshana pa /
NK015(ba)027:1346: so so'i 'khora 'bum phrag dang bcas pa bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1347: yang na dbang phyug ma rnams kyi sngags brjod pa
NK015(ba)027:1348: tsam gyis bya nag thang la bab pa ltar du
NK015(ba)027:1349: bskyed pa dang / dbang gi dus su mkha' gsang nas bskyed gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:1351: he ru ka lnga la nyi zla pad+ma'i steng na
NK015(ba)027:1352: rang rang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' re re'i
NK015(ba)027:1353: thugs kha na nyi ma la phyag mtshan dang po
NK015(ba)027:1354: rnams la h'u lnga'i mtshan pa la ru lu'i bskor
NK015(ba)027:1355: ba'o / kha dog ni sku mdog bzhin no //
NK015(ba)027:1356: yum lnga la nyi ma'i steng du b+han+d+ha'i nang du
NK015(ba)027:1357: nyi ma'i steng na h'u lnga la ru lus g.yon
NK015(ba)027:1358: du 'khor ba'o // ma mo nyi shu'i thugs kar
NK015(ba)027:1359: nyi ma'i steng na rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte
NK015(ba)027:1360: ba la nyi ma'i steng na ma mo brgyad la
NK015(ba)027:1361: du 'khor ba'o // ha / phra men brgyad la he /
NK015(ba)027:1363: de'i mtha' mar ru lu'i rang sngags kyis g.yas su bskor /
NK015(ba)027:1364: dbang mo la nyi ma'i steng na b+han+d+ha phyed pa b+h+yos mtshan pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1365: dbu rgyan ni lha rang rang gi thugs ka'i rtsa
NK015(ba)027:1366: ba'i sa bon las yig 'bru rang 'dra ba re
NK015(ba)027:1367: re chad de / ye shes sems dpa' sgal tshig gi rta la brgyud /
NK015(ba)027:1368: srog dag pa'i lam nas yar thon ste /
NK015(ba)027:1369: de nas lha rang rang gi thugs ka nas 'thon te /
NK015(ba)027:1370: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams la phog pas /
NK015(ba)027:1371: thugs la mnyes pa'i pu tsa phul /
NK015(ba)027:1373: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad khrag 'thung rigs lnga'i rnam par 'dus te /
NK015(ba)027:1374: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs nas sbyor ba mdzad de /
NK015(ba)027:1375: byang chub kyi sems dbu'i gnas lngar thim pa las /
NK015(ba)027:1377: badz+ra he ru ka'i spyi gtsug tu /
NK015(ba)027:1378: badz+ra he ru ka'i gtso bor byas pa la sogs
NK015(ba)027:1379: rigs rang rang gis gtsos pa'i yab rnams la yab
NK015(ba)027:1380: dang / yum rnams la yum gyi dbu rgyan /
NK015(ba)027:1381: gnas yul gyi khro mo nyi shu la /
NK015(ba)027:1382: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:1383: gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa re res dbu rgyan /
NK015(ba)027:1384: dbang mo nyer brgyad la phrin las drag po kho na mdzad pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)027:1385: lcags kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa re res dbu rgyan par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:1387: rigs lnga la sbyi bor dung khang nang du zla ba'i steng du dkar po /
NK015(ba)027:1388: mgrin par ljags rdo rje nyal stabs lte ba khog seng gi nang du /
NK015(ba)027:1389: pad 'dab brgyad kyi steng du +aahdamara po /
NK015(ba)027:1390: thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h'u mthing ka /
NK015(ba)027:1391: lte bar rin chen zur brgyad kyi steng du s+w+aa ser po /
NK015(ba)027:1392: gsang gnas su chos 'byung gru gsum gyi steng du /
NK015(ba)027:1393: h+aa ljang ku rnams la spro bsdu byas pas /
NK015(ba)027:1395: sarba ta th+aa ga ta la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK015(ba)027:1396: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi lha /
NK015(ba)027:1397: he ru ka lnga gzhung bzhin du bsgom la /
NK015(ba)027:1398: de rnams kyi thugs kar rang rang gi sa bon bsgom la ru lu 'bru brgyad kyi bskor ba'am /
NK015(ba)027:1400: koo r+ai la sogs ma mo rnams kyi spyi bor zla bar /
NK015(ba)027:1401: mgrin par pad+mara +aah thugs kar nyi mar h'u la
NK015(ba)027:1402: lha rang rang gi sngags tsho gsum gyis bskor ba'am
NK015(ba)027:1403: / phyag rgya spros pa ltar na kun la byin rlabs kyi lha rnams bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1404: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'dir bskyed pa 'dis /
NK015(ba)027:1405: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyi
NK015(ba)027:1406: gar khyab par dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsam gyis
NK015(ba)027:1407: mi khyab par 'byung bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1408: las kyis gzhung bstan pa la bcu ste /
NK015(ba)027:1409: khro bo sngon gyi gleng gzhi brjod cing snyan gsan dbab pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:1412: brten par bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:1413: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:1414: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i gdug pa bsreg cing zil gyis mnan pa'i dam tshig bstan pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:1420: dang po snyan gsan dbab nas phyag 'tshal ba yan chad la /
NK015(ba)027:1423: phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin dang bzhi bzhi yod par shes so //
NK015(ba)027:1424: snyan gsan dbab pa la sogs pa'i sngags dang tshig bcad gzhung nas gsal /
NK015(ba)027:1425: phyag rgya ni thod phreng gis phyag rgya smin mtshams su bca' ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:1426: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya thugs kar bca' ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:1428: khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang 'dra ba chos kyi sku la gzugs kyi skur bzhengs te /
NK015(ba)027:1429: bsgrub pa po la thugs kyis dgongs /
NK015(ba)027:1431: zhal gyis phyogs te byon ma rag par bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1433: mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams su bca' ste /
NK015(ba)027:1434: h+r+aihgasuma dang thal mo len gsum gdab pa dang sprad do //
NK015(ba)027:1436: dkyil 'khor de dag gis mdun gzhal yas khang gi shar phyogs su bzhugs par bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1438: phyag rgya sor mo nang du bsnol /
NK015(ba)027:1439: gung mo rtse sprad sgreng ba'am /
NK015(ba)027:1440: yang na thal mo sbyar ro //
NK015(ba)027:1442: mdun gyi ye shes kyi gzhal yas /
NK015(ba)027:1443: dam tshig gi zhal yas la thim /
NK015(ba)027:1444: lha rnams nang du byon pas gdan re re'i steng
NK015(ba)027:1445: na ye shes dang dam tshig gi lha gnyis gnyis
NK015(ba)027:1447: sku brten par bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1448: phyag rgya sor mo snying kar bsnol la /
NK015(ba)027:1451: dam tshig gi lha so so la ye shes kyi lha so sor thim par bsam /
NK015(ba)027:1452: dam tshig brten pa la gnyis te /
NK015(ba)027:1453: dang po phrin las lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i dam tshig brten par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni /
NK015(ba)027:1454: rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi g.yas g.yon gyi mthe bong bsnol mar mche ba'i steng du bzhag la /
NK015(ba)027:1455: mathe'u chung gnyis sgreng ngang la /
NK015(ba)027:1457: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor des bdag gzhan gyi phrin
NK015(ba)027:1458: las thams cad lhun gyi grub par byed pa la
NK015(ba)027:1460: gnyis pa sku gsung thugs kyis dngos grub brten pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya la /
NK015(ba)027:1461: thod pa gsum gyi phyag rgya dang /
NK015(ba)027:1464: sa ma ya phata ces pa gsum sprad do //
NK015(ba)027:1466: sngon gyi dam tshig dran ste /
NK015(ba)027:1467: bdag sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ma thob par du brten par bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1468: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i gdug pa bsregs cing zil gyis mnan pa'i phyag rgya ni /
NK015(ba)027:1469: rdo rje khu tshur bcing pa las mthe bong mthe chung gnyis sgreng ste /
NK015(ba)027:1470: lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol nas mche ba'i thad kar
NK015(ba)027:1471: bzhag la mthar gshog pa g.yob pa ltar bya la
NK015(ba)027:1473: dpal chen po'i mche ba las /
NK015(ba)027:1474: 'od zer bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu byung bas /
NK015(ba)027:1475: dbang phyug ma'i 'khor phyi rim na las kyi gdug
NK015(ba)027:1476: pa can yod pa'i gdug pa can thul gyi bsregs
NK015(ba)027:1477: par bsgom pa'am / yang na dpal chen po'i zhal du bstim pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1479: lag pa thal mo bskor zhing /
NK015(ba)027:1480: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga ces sogs brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1481: shar nas ma mo rgyas 'debs ma dkar mo gangs ri la nyi ma shar ba 'dra ba /
NK015(ba)027:1482: g.yon tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams pa la /
NK015(ba)027:1483: g.yas 'dod pa'i mda' lnga bsnams pas btegs pa'i sbyor bas shar phyogs nas phyag bgyid do //
