NK015(ba)027:1484: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga ces sogs brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1485: lho nas rmongs byed ma ser mo gser gyi ri la nyi ma shar ba 'dra ba /
NK015(ba)027:1486: phyag g.yon b+han+d+ha sbrang chang gis bkang ba /
NK015(ba)027:1487: g.yas na gri gug bsnams pas lho phyogs nas phyag bgyid do //
NK015(ba)027:1488: sh+r+ai badz+ra kha ta ces sogs brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1489: zab mo dmar mo pad+ma r+aa ga'i ri la nyi ma shar ba 'dra ba g.yas kha t+aam ka /
NK015(ba)027:1490: g.yon b+han+d+ha rak+tasa bkang ba nub nas phyag bgyid do //
NK015(ba)027:1491: sh+r+ai badz+ra g+han+d+ha la ces sogs brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:1492: lha mo tshe 'phel ma ljang ku mrgad ta'i ri
NK015(ba)027:1493: la nyi ma shar ba 'dra ba g.yas b+han+d+ha bdud
NK015(ba)027:1494: rtsi lngas bkang ba'i kha rdo rje rgya gram gyis
NK015(ba)027:1495: bcad pa'i lte ba las sangs rgyas snang ba mtha'
NK015(ba)027:1496: yas kyi sku lte ba yan chad byung ba /
NK015(ba)027:1497: g.yon dril bu bsnams pas byang phyogs nas phyag bgyid do //
NK015(ba)027:1499: dang po phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1500: lha gang dang gang gi phyag rgya'i tshigs su bcad pa gyer ba'i tshe /
NK015(ba)027:1501: de dang de'i skur dpa' bo go barje ba'i tshul du gsal bar bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1502: de'i dus su lus kyi yang stang stabs kyi phyag rgya baca'o //
NK015(ba)027:1503: gnyis pa kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1504: nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya smin mtshams su bca' la /
NK015(ba)027:1505: chos thams cad kun tu bzang po'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK015(ba)027:1506: bzang mo'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK015(ba)027:1507: gnyis su med pa byang chub sems kyi de kho na nyid du rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:1508: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du chos thams
NK015(ba)027:1509: cad 'dod yon drug tu ma gyur pa med pas
NK015(ba)027:1510: / de dag thams cad khams drug gi lha mor gyur pas /
NK015(ba)027:1511: nam mkha' la sprin bzhin du 'khrigs /
NK015(ba)027:1512: sa gzhi la rtsi shing bzhin du skyes /
NK015(ba)027:1513: bar snang gang bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1514: gsum pa phyi'i mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1515: gtor ma'i steng 'dod yon gyi lha mo sgro zhing mchod pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1516: bzhi pa nang gi mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1517: de nyid kyi 'og sha'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK015(ba)027:1519: khrag gi rgya mtshor gyur nas mchod pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1520: sman mchod ni gzhung nas gsal lo //
NK015(ba)027:1521: lnga pa gsang ba sbyor mchod ni /
NK015(ba)027:1522: gtso bo yab yum gyi smin mtshams kyi thad kar sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po dang /
NK015(ba)027:1523: yum sku mdog dmar mo dang gnyis bsgom pa la /
NK015(ba)027:1524: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs /
NK015(ba)027:1525: de nas yum gyi rin chen brjod /
NK015(ba)027:1526: yab kyis rdo rje ces brjod /
NK015(ba)027:1527: sngags bzhi rim bzhin brjod nas sbyor ba mdzad pa las /
NK015(ba)027:1528: lha mo dmar mo lnga byung bas lnga la 'khril /
NK015(ba)027:1529: yab lnga bcu rtsa gsum byung nas yum la 'khril bas lha rnams so sor mnyes par bsam /
NK015(ba)027:1530: sems dpa' yab yum smin mtshams na tshur thim /
NK015(ba)027:1531: drug pa khams gsum yongs sgrol gyi mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1532: dbang phyug chen po yab yum sku mdog nag po /
NK015(ba)027:1533: yum gyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du lo ka'i dngos po thams cad bcug nas /
NK015(ba)027:1534: yab kyi tri shu las len gsum dkrugs nas bdud rtsir gyur nas /
NK015(ba)027:1535: dbang phyug chen po'i tshigs bcad brjod par bsam la /
NK015(ba)027:1536: yab lngas zhal du gsol bar bsam /
NK015(ba)027:1538: gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgya ni rdar gyur /
NK015(ba)027:1539: ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ni rnga yog tu gyur nas brdung ste /
NK015(ba)027:1540: thams cad theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi rnga sgrar gyur /
NK015(ba)027:1541: des khams gsum sems can thams cad la chos kyi sgra rgyun mi chad par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:1543: dril bu'i sgra mthar stong ba ltar /
NK015(ba)027:1544: snang srid kyi chos thams cad dngos po ci ltar snang na yang /
NK015(ba)027:1545: don la chos nyid kyi ngang du dbyer med pa'i don gyis mnyes pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1547: tshigs su bcad pa tsan lnga ste /
NK015(ba)027:1548: dang po gtso bos glu blangs bar bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1553: lha dang gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa la glu'i sgra ti ri ri grags pa bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1555: rgyas pa'i glu blangs pa'i lugs su dkyil 'khor gyi
NK015(ba)027:1556: lha kun gyis rang la rang bstod pa'i tshul gyis
NK015(ba)027:1558: 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)027:1559: shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas rgud stong //
NK015(ba)027:1560: gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)027:1561: gti mug rdo rje b+hud+d+ha he ru kah ye shes rdo rje nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms //
NK015(ba)027:1562: thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po 'jig /
NK015(ba)027:1563: zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)027:1564: zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra he ru kah rin chen dbyig ltar re ba kun bskang ba //
NK015(ba)027:1565: bdag med zhi gnas chu'i bskal pa 'khrugs //
NK015(ba)027:1566: nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)027:1567: nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru kah 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1568: lhag mthong me chen bskal pas thams cad bsreg /
NK015(ba)027:1569: 'dod chags tshul gyi 'dod chags 'jom mdzad pa /
NK015(ba)027:1571: / 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru kah phrin las rgya mtsho 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1572: shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis gtong //
NK015(ba)027:1573: phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'jom mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)027:1574: phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru kah sku'i longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1575: shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)027:1576: rtogs pa'i reg bya mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma //
NK015(ba)027:1577: chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbang bsgyur khro mo rgyal //
NK015(ba)027:1578: thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1579: brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)027:1580: phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1581: sra rten rdo rje dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal //
NK015(ba)027:1582: yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1583: sbyin pa mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)027:1584: ting 'dzin ro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1585: bdag med zhi gnas dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal //
NK015(ba)027:1586: gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1587: tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)027:1588: gsung rab sgra'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1589: lhag mthong ye shes dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal //
NK015(ba)027:1590: phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1591: bzod pa mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)027:1592: tshul khrims dri'i mchod pas mnyes byed cing //
NK015(ba)027:1593: thogs med las kyi dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal //
NK015(ba)027:1594: thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs /
NK015(ba)027:1596: / 'gug mdzad ye shes lnga'i dbyug to can //
NK015(ba)027:1597: dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1598: srid gsum 'jom mdzad dbyig thog koo r+ai ma //
NK015(ba)027:1599: sku'i tshogs sdud yon tan rkun mo'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)027:1600: mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel //
NK015(ba)027:1601: bden gnyis lta ba'i khro tshul 'gro la gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1602: dam tshig dbyings mchog bskul byed tsoo r+ai ma //
NK015(ba)027:1603: gsung gi thams cad zil gnon rmong mo'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)027:1604: dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi spang chu srin can //
NK015(ba)027:1605: mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par blta //
NK015(ba)027:1606: stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo ha //
NK015(ba)027:1607: thal bar byed pa'i thal byed ma'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)027:1608: kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams //
NK015(ba)027:1609: sa dgu rtog 'jom shi ba slangs bar gzigs /
NK015(ba)027:1611: / 'jig rten thal byed dril thogs bet+ta l+ai /
NK015(ba)027:1613: / 'byed med shes rab mi rtogs sbos mo'i tshogs /
NK015(ba)027:1616: khro bar gzigs tshul thugs rjes rgyun gyis rol //
NK015(ba)027:1617: bde chen dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka s+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1618: zhe sdang tshul gyis 'jom mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)027:1619: myos byed dbyings nas ye shes gnyis med pha //
NK015(ba)027:1620: thugs rje dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1621: snod bcud dkrugs nas bskang mdzad g+hasma r+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1622: chags pa'i tshul gyi don mdzad sme sha can //
NK015(ba)027:1623: ma ni rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral bar mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1624: mtha' gnyis ma spangs rnam par g.yeng tshul gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1625: thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol byed sme sha n+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1626: thams cad kun gyis 'byung 'gyur ma tshogs ma //
NK015(ba)027:1627: kun gyis las mdzad chos sku snying po 'dzin //
NK015(ba)027:1628: kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan /
NK015(ba)027:1630: / 'bar bas stong gsum stobs byed tsan+da li /
NK015(ba)027:1632: / 'jom byed rtsa 'phags rdo rje thugs kyi yum //
NK015(ba)027:1633: gnyen po'i stobs kyis thams cad zil gyi gnon //
NK015(ba)027:1634: shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don /
NK015(ba)027:1636: / 'jig rten sdug bsngal bsgral phyir sing+ha ma //
NK015(ba)027:1637: dpa' gtum za byed ye shes thugs rje can //
NK015(ba)027:1638: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin 'gro don mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1639: thugs rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1640: nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'jom mdzod b+y+aa kri ma /
NK015(ba)027:1642: / 'jom byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1643: thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1644: don gyi chos sku 'dzin med ljags la ltar /
NK015(ba)027:1646: / 'dod chags dur khrod 'jom mdzad sri wa ma //
NK015(ba)027:1647: mi 'byed spyod pas las mchog rigs kyi yum //
NK015(ba)027:1648: g.yer pa'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srungs //
NK015(ba)027:1649: chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1650: phrag dog las kun 'grub byed shwa na ma //
NK015(ba)027:1651: yid kyi ye shes so sor kun la rtogs //
NK015(ba)027:1652: rnam shes gyis bsad god 'brel tshul khrims srungs /
NK015(ba)027:1654: / 'khor ba rgyun gcod rgyu gcod spu gri bsnams //
NK015(ba)027:1655: mgyogs ma snyag byed khrag 'thung grid+ha ma //
NK015(ba)027:1656: rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'phrog mtshan ma 'joms //
NK015(ba)027:1657: bsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
NK015(ba)027:1658: mtha' 'das chos sku gzung 'dzin spang tshul gzung /
NK015(ba)027:1660: / 'gro ba'i sdud bsngal tshe 'phrog kang+ka ma //
NK015(ba)027:1661: bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag pa'i //
NK015(ba)027:1662: mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1663: chos sku thugs su chud phyir zhal na thog /
NK015(ba)027:1664: yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kh+aa kha ma //
NK015(ba)027:1665: dbyings las mi rtogs 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs //
NK015(ba)027:1666: dbyings kyi thugs rje phrin las 'dus ma byas //
NK015(ba)027:1667: gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK015(ba)027:1668: mtha' gnyis spang pa'i rngam tshul u l+au ma //
NK015(ba)027:1669: sbyin pas rig pa'i klong du mtsho drang ltar //
NK015(ba)027:1670: thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'khor ba gting nas 'dren //
NK015(ba)027:1671: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin rtse gcig mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1672: thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma //
NK015(ba)027:1673: don dang mthun pas bdag kyang dga' bar mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1674: rin chen phyag rgya sems can re 'dod bskangs //
NK015(ba)027:1675: byams pa'i zhags pas sems can rgyud 'dzin cing //
NK015(ba)027:1676: yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma //
NK015(ba)027:1677: gzhan gyis don du spyad pas bdag gi don //
NK015(ba)027:1678: shes rab sgron mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal bsal //
NK015(ba)027:1679: don gnyis mi 'da' lhun grub dga' ba'i mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1680: kun mkhyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan //
NK015(ba)027:1681: snyan par smra ba kun kyang dbang du byed //
NK015(ba)027:1682: btang snyoms thabs mkhas 'gro don rtse gcig rol //
NK015(ba)027:1683: phab pas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho //
NK015(ba)027:1684: chos ston bag chags byang mdzad gri 'khrol ma //
NK015(ba)027:1685: rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo'i gzugs 'dzin cing //
NK015(ba)027:1686: thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar zas su za //
NK015(ba)027:1687: srid pa'i sems can chags snying khrag mtsho gsol //
NK015(ba)027:1688: dbang drag las mdzad ma nu rak+sha s+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1689: sdug bsngal mya ngan 'da' rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs //
NK015(ba)027:1690: tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyis dbu bzhir ldan //
NK015(ba)027:1691: zhal bzhir smrang 'don gling bzhir bkra shis 'bar //
NK015(ba)027:1692: gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ni //
NK015(ba)027:1693: thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma //
NK015(ba)027:1694: ma rig dug gsum 'jom mdzad dpal rtse bsnams //
NK015(ba)027:1695: bud med chags tshul dbang mdzod dka' bzlog ma //
NK015(ba)027:1696: chags pa'i skyon bral lha chen re'u tri ma //
NK015(ba)027:1697: thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma /
NK015(ba)027:1699: / 'brel pa'i thugs rjes 'jig rten kun la gtogs //
NK015(ba)027:1700: phrin las rgya mtshos sgrol ba'i bzhad chen ma /
NK015(ba)027:1702: / 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod drag mo b+ha na b+he /
NK015(ba)027:1704: / 'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1705: rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs //
NK015(ba)027:1706: nyon mongs tha ba 'big pa'i mdung thung 'phen //
NK015(ba)027:1707: gzhon tshul chags pa'i dbang mdzod ku m+aa r+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1708: rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med //
NK015(ba)027:1709: lha'i rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing //
NK015(ba)027:1710: mchod sbyin brgya mdzad mi dmigs sku dkar mdog /
NK015(ba)027:1711: gsod byed rdo rje lce 'beb in+d+ra ma //
NK015(ba)027:1712: byams pa'i thugs rje dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar //
NK015(ba)027:1713: b+han+d+ha snod yongs bcud kyi khrag mtsho ma //
NK015(ba)027:1714: rngam pa'i tshul gyis dug gsum za byed ma //
NK015(ba)027:1715: sdug bsngal dbyings su gsod mdzad sing ka la //
NK015(ba)027:1716: sems can 'dul thabs khro mo'i mchog tu mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1717: mun sel sgron 'bar bdud rtsi nad gsol mdzad /
NK015(ba)027:1719: / 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs yang //
NK015(ba)027:1720: chags pa'i dbang mdzad skyon bral a mri ta //
NK015(ba)027:1721: zhi ba'i las ni gsol ba mchog tu mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1722: zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku //
NK015(ba)027:1723: gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgron mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1724: gdan mchog dam pa stobs shigs so'u ni //
NK015(ba)027:1725: dbyig ba'i 'tshog pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1726: thabs kyi ma rmong ljang gu phrin las mdog /
NK015(ba)027:1727: nan tan drag shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams //
NK015(ba)027:1728: drag byed spyi na 'joms pa'i ta na ham //
NK015(ba)027:1729: log par lta ba 'jig byed spyan gyis mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1730: skye ba phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol //
NK015(ba)027:1731: las mdzad chags tshul gser gyi rked chings can //
NK015(ba)027:1732: drag mo'i rngam tshul glog 'gyur rak+sha s+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1733: phred pa rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes //
NK015(ba)027:1734: snying rje rgyun skad pa spu zhags pa yi //
NK015(ba)027:1735: chags med zhing du khams gsum 'dren mdzad ma //
NK015(ba)027:1736: rgyun gyi thugs rje sgrol mdzad bag+sha s+ai //
NK015(ba)027:1737: dbyig pas 'tshog pa 'chang pa'i mchog tu mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1738: gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'jom mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1739: yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma //
NK015(ba)027:1740: stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad rasti ma //
NK015(ba)027:1741: ra ro 'dra ba dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1742: chos rnams dngos med don rtogs rtag tu myos //
NK015(ba)027:1743: nyon mongs tha ba bklog pa'i gshol bsnams shing //
NK015(ba)027:1744: dge ba'i lo thog bskyed mdzad re ti re ma ti //
NK015(ba)027:1745: brten pas gzhan phan byed pa dpa' bo mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1746: ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug byed cing //
NK015(ba)027:1747: bsnyems pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod //
NK015(ba)027:1748: gsol byed dral mdzad e ka tsa ra ma //
NK015(ba)027:1749: bud med chags tshul 'gro ba dbang du sdud //
NK015(ba)027:1750: thams cad ma lus 'gug byed dge ba'i las /
NK015(ba)027:1752: / 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum yid 'phrog cing //
NK015(ba)027:1753: thugs rje zhen pa'i ma nu ha ra ma //
NK015(ba)027:1754: khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing //
NK015(ba)027:1755: gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad rbod gtong can //
NK015(ba)027:1756: mi bzad gter ldan nor gyi bum pa 'dzin //
NK015(ba)027:1757: sdug bsngal re bskong thag thugs si ti kam //
NK015(ba)027:1758: reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams ste mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1759: srid gsum dbugs kyis srog 'byin tshe 'phel ma //
NK015(ba)027:1760: bder gshegs rigs rgyud sems can sgrol mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1761: khams gsum gnas nas skyong mdzad b+h+aa ya b+he //
NK015(ba)027:1762: snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la //
NK015(ba)027:1763: srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba //
NK015(ba)027:1764: bsad pa nyi tshe'i las kyi 'dul bar mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1765: sdug bsngal dbyings su gsod mdzad m+aa ra na //
NK015(ba)027:1766: gzi brjid can ni me'i lam ste mchog /
NK015(ba)027:1767: 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsreg /
NK015(ba)027:1768: za byed bskal pa'i dus mtha'i tshul ston pa //
NK015(ba)027:1769: lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag+na ye //
NK015(ba)027:1770: mche ba dag pa skye bzhi rtsad gcod bzhugs //
NK015(ba)027:1771: nyon mongs tha ba bzlog mdzad phag gis dbu /
NK015(ba)027:1773: / 'og gis phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor //
NK015(ba)027:1774: skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed b+ha ra h+ai /
NK015(ba)027:1776: / 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1777: thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1778: dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag bzlog par mdzad //
NK015(ba)027:1779: lung gis dur khrod bzlog mdzad rtsa mun tri /
NK015(ba)027:1781: / 'jig las lhag pa'i bgegs ni gzhan med mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1782: stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs la mnga' mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1783: sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi g+hi ham gtor //
NK015(ba)027:1784: sdug bsngal nad gsos mdzad pa'i b+hu ta na //
NK015(ba)027:1785: chu las lhag pa'i ro ni gzhan med mkhyen //
NK015(ba)027:1786: nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1787: gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtong sbrul zhags bsnams //
NK015(ba)027:1788: zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud pa ni ma /
NK015(ba)027:1790: / 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag /
NK015(ba)027:1791: srid gsum 'jom byed tri shul gding po bsnams //
NK015(ba)027:1792: thugs rje shugs kyi 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams /
NK015(ba)027:1794: / 'khor bar thugs rje shar ba k+aa l+ai ma //
NK015(ba)027:1795: chags pas thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can //
NK015(ba)027:1796: byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing //
NK015(ba)027:1797: gang la ci 'dul de la der ston pa'i //
NK015(ba)027:1798: yon tan tshogs rdzogs re bskang tsa k+aa la //
NK015(ba)027:1799: ston pa'i bka' dang rang gis dam tshig gnyis //
NK015(ba)027:1800: mi mda' ma grub bar du brten por bzhugs //
NK015(ba)027:1801: dam tshig sgrogs kyis sems can 'dul mdzad cing //
NK015(ba)027:1802: ma rig nub mdzad bum pa ka na ma //
NK015(ba)027:1803: sku gsum yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pas //
NK015(ba)027:1804: stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'beb //
NK015(ba)027:1805: so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs shing //
NK015(ba)027:1806: chos ston bag chags byang mdzad lam+b+ho d+ha ra ma //
NK015(ba)027:1808: ho rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1809: mchod pa rgya mtsho gnas su stobs par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1810: srid pa rgya mtsho dbyings su sgrol bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1811: dam tshig rgya mtsho bskong bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1812: dam can rgya mtsho thugs dam bskong bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1813: bdud dpung rgya mtsho bcom par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1814: bgegs dpung rgya mtsho zhig par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1815: 'khor ba rgya mtsho stongs par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1816: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zhi bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1817: bdag nyid chen po lhun gyi grub par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1819: bdag cag rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:1823: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu rdul du rlog cig /
NK015(ba)027:1824: bdag cag rnal 'byor pa'i bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par mdzod cig /
NK015(ba)027:1830: de la rtsa sngags la gnyis te /
NK015(ba)027:1831: phra mo'i ting 'dzin la thugs kyi sgrib pa sbyab ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:1834: bdag gi thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i thugs mtshan gyi lte ba la /
NK015(ba)027:1835: nyi ma'i steng du h'u mthing nag gis mtha' bskor
NK015(ba)027:1836: du 'bru brgyad kha dog mthing nag gis mdun phyogs
NK015(ba)027:1837: nas brtsam ste g.yas su 'khor bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1838: de la ting nge 'dzin brten pas 'phro 'du bya ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1839: rim par dbus kyi h'u las 'od mthing nag phra mo gcig phyir spro /
NK015(ba)027:1841: la tshur spro h'u la thim par bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1842: de gsal nas rim par 'bru gzhan la'ang gong ltar spro bsdu bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1843: de gsal nas gcig char du h'u la 'od zer mthing nag brgyad sras kyi phyir spro /
NK015(ba)027:1845: 'bru brgyad po la tshur spros h'u la thim par bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1846: de ltar yang yang goms par bya'o /
NK015(ba)027:1848: / 'di ni bsnyen pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas gal che ste /
NK015(ba)027:1849: goms pa la nan tan bya'o gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:1850: ngag gis bzlas pa la bzhi'i dang po /
NK015(ba)027:1851: thabs dang shes rab steng sgo dbye ba'i bzlas pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1852: yum gyi thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du b+han+d+ha'i nang
NK015(ba)027:1853: du nyi ma'i steng du h'u mthing nag gi tha
NK015(ba)027:1854: mar 'bru brgyad kha dog mthing nag gis g.yon du
NK015(ba)027:1856: yum gyi mgrin par pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi steng du
NK015(ba)027:1857: ljags rdo rje rtse gsum par bsgom pa'i lte ba'i
NK015(ba)027:1858: nang du h'u la 'bru brgyad kyis g.yon du 'khor
NK015(ba)027:1859: ro // yab kyis ljags la'ang de ltar du bsgom pa'i sngags g.yas su 'khor bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1860: de nas sngags tshar gcig brjod pas dbus kyi h'u
NK015(ba)027:1861: la 'od mthing nag bskul ba'i tshul gyis 'bru brgyad
NK015(ba)027:1862: la phog pas 'bru brgyad g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1863: de nas rdo rje'i rwa dbu ma nas ye shes sems dpa'i spyi gtsug tu byung ste /
NK015(ba)027:1864: ljags kyi rdo rje'i lte bar g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1865: yum gyi ljags kyi thor to la thim nas rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'u la g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1866: de nas mar brgyud pas b+han+d+ha'i nang gi 'bru brgyad la bskul ba'i tshul gyis g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1867: de nas rang gi thugs kar thim pas der yang g.yas su 'khor ste snga ma bzhin bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1868: phyi bskor gcig la sngags tshar bzhi 'agro'o /
NK015(ba)027:1870: / 'bum mam bye ba tsam du bzla gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:1871: gnyis pa gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i bzlas pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1872: yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje mthing nag rtse dgu pa yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs par bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1873: de'i lte bar nyi ma'i steng du h'u la 'bru brgyad kyis g.yas su 'khor bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1874: de nas sngags bzlas pas bdag gi thugs kar g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1876: gsang ba'i rdo rje'i 'bru brgyad la g.yas su 'khor te rdo rje'i rwa dbu ma nas /
NK015(ba)027:1877: yum gyi pad+ma'i zil 'bru nas yar brgyud de /
NK015(ba)027:1878: yum gyi thugs kar g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1879: de nas yar brgyud de ljags kyi 'bru brgyad la g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1880: de nas yab kyi ljags la thim /
NK015(ba)027:1882: de nas mar brgyud yab kyi thugs kar g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1883: de nas tshul snga ma bzhin no //
NK015(ba)027:1884: de ltar 'bum mam bye ba tsam du bazla'o //
NK015(ba)027:1885: gsum pa dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la blang ba'i bsnyen pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1886: sngags bzlas bas thugs kar g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1887: de nas yar brgyud de ljags la g.yas su 'khor bas yum gyi ljags la thim /
NK015(ba)027:1888: de nas mar brgyud pas yum gyi thugs kar g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1889: pad+ma'i zil 'bru nas rdo rje'i rwa dbu ma'i h'u la g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1890: de nas yar brgyud pas bdag gi thugs ka'i h'u la g.yas su 'khor te /
NK015(ba)027:1891: bskor ba gcig la sngags mtshan lnga 'gro /
NK015(ba)027:1892: 'di la'ang 'bum mam bye ba tsam bya /
NK015(ba)027:1893: rang sngags kyi kha gson par 'dir bya gsungs /
NK015(ba)027:1894: de nas dngos grub kyi mtshan rtags byung na /
NK015(ba)027:1895: bzhi pa bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'phro 'du ye shes lha mnyes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1896: khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la mdun du bzhugs /
NK015(ba)027:1897: de'i gtso bo'i thugs kar sems dpa' gsum brtsegs bdag nyid dang 'dra bar gsal bar bsgom /
NK015(ba)027:1899: sngags brjod pas bdag gi thugs kar g.yas su 'khor te /
NK015(ba)027:1900: yar byung bas ljags kyi thor to'i rtse nas /
NK015(ba)027:1901: 'od 'phros pas mdun gyi de'i thugs kar thim /
NK015(ba)027:1902: der 'bru brgyad la bskul ba'i tshul gyis g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1903: de nas yar brgyud de sngags kyi thor to'i rtse
NK015(ba)027:1904: nas 'phros pas bdag gis thugs kar thim te g.yas
NK015(ba)027:1905: su 'khor / de ltar yang yang bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1906: bzlas pa de dag gang byed kyang dkyil 'khor gyi lha yab rnams bdag la bsdu /
NK015(ba)027:1907: yum rnams yum la bsdu la /
NK015(ba)027:1908: yab yum gnyis su gnas la bsnyen pa bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1909: dbang mo rnams yum la bsdu gsungs so //
NK015(ba)027:1910: rang sngags kyi bsnyen pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1911: dal mi bsdu bar so sor gsal bar bsgom la /
NK015(ba)027:1912: gtso bo yab yum gyis thugs kar ru lu'i phyi rol tu rang sngags kyis yab g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1914: rigs bzhi de dang 'dra ba las yig 'bru'i kha dog so sor sku mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:1915: ma mo nyi shu yang ha he phata la rang sngags kyis g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1916: dbang mo'i thugs kar b+h+yo la rang sngags kyis g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1917: de nas sngags brjod pas rang gis thugs kar g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1918: de nas sngags la sngags chad pa'i tshul gyis phreng ba zhal du byung /
NK015(ba)027:1919: ljags nas yum gyi ljags la thim /
NK015(ba)027:1920: de nas mar brgyud yum gyis sngags bsgril ma g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1921: der 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i tshul gyis g.yon du 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1922: de nas yum sngags la gcig chad pas /
NK015(ba)027:1923: sngags sgril ma yab kyi thugs kar thim /
NK015(ba)027:1925: der yang 'od zer gyi bskul ba'i tshul gyis g.yas su 'khor /
NK015(ba)027:1926: de nas sngags sgril ma yar brgyud de snga ma bzhin bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1927: rigs bzhi'ang gtso bo dang mthun pa las 'od zer spro zhing gtso bo'i thugs kar thim /
NK015(ba)027:1928: ma mo rnams rang rang gis thugs kar bskor la
NK015(ba)027:1929: 'od zer 'phro ba gtso bo'i thugs kar bstim mo
NK015(ba)027:1931: / / 'bum mam bye ba la sogs pas bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1933: ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK015(ba)027:1935: 'bru brgyad kyi don la gnyis te /
NK015(ba)027:1936: ru lu yon tan du shes pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:1937: ru lu bye brag tu shes pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1939: ru lu 'di ltar yon tan che //
NK015(ba)027:1940: ru lu 'di ltar rtogs pa bskyed //
NK015(ba)027:1941: ru lu 'di ltar sgrib pa spang //
NK015(ba)027:1942: ru lu 'di ltar dngos grub thob //
NK015(ba)027:1944: de la yon tan che ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1945: sngon sngags spyod nyes pa'i las kyis /
NK015(ba)027:1946: ru tra nag po de rang gi nus pa'i nga rgyal gyis gzhan la gnod sbyor byed pa'i tshe /
NK015(ba)027:1947: dpal chen pos kho rang dbang du bsdus nas kho rang bsgral ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:1948: lag cha 'phrog pa la sogs pa rnams kyang gsang sngags kyi mathu'o //
NK015(ba)027:1950: mtshan ma can gyis lha'i sku bsgom pas /
NK015(ba)027:1951: don chos nyid skye med kyis don rtogs pa yang gsang sngags kyis mathu'o //
NK015(ba)027:1953: lha bsgom zhing sgrib pa sbyang ba yang gsang sngags kyi mathu'o //
NK015(ba)027:1955: gzhung bzhin du bsnyen cing bsgrub na /
NK015(ba)027:1956: rab phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob /
NK015(ba)027:1958: tha mas kyang mkha' 'gro dbang du 'dus zhing las bzhi thogs pa med par 'grub bo //
NK015(ba)027:1959: ru lu bye brag tu shes pa la brgyad kyi dang po bsnyen sgrub tu shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1961: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung pa lnga /
NK015(ba)027:1962: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs kha dog ma 'dres par so sor gsal ba de /
NK015(ba)027:1963: rgyu chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' chos nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang las /
NK015(ba)027:1964: 'bras bu ye shes lnga'i gzhal yas khang gsal la mi sgrib par bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1965: bcud lha'i dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1966: ru lu 'od zer bcud la phog ste /
NK015(ba)027:1967: khams gsum sems can gyi rtog tshogs rgyu las /
NK015(ba)027:1968: 'bras bu'i khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi lhar bsgom zhing bazla'o //
NK015(ba)027:1969: ru lu lhar shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:1971: ni rgyu'i gnas skabs na phung po dang 'byung ba /
NK015(ba)027:1972: 'bras bu'i dus su rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum du gsal ba'o //
NK015(ba)027:1974: rgyu'i gnas skabs na rnam shes bzhi dang /
NK015(ba)027:1976: 'bras bu'i dus koo r+ai ma brgyad do //
NK015(ba)027:1978: rgyu'i dus su dbang po bzhi dang dus bzhi /
NK015(ba)027:1979: 'bras bu'i dus su sing+ha ma brgyad do //
NK015(ba)027:1980: h'u dang po rgyu'i dus su phyin ci log bzhi /
NK015(ba)027:1981: 'bras bu'i dus su sgo ma bzhi'o //
NK015(ba)027:1982: b+h+yo ni rgyu'i dus su zag pa dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin la /
NK015(ba)027:1983: 'bras bu'i dus su las dang ye shes dbyer med pa dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin no //
NK015(ba)027:1985: rgyu'i dus su nyon mongs pa'i yid /
NK015(ba)027:1986: 'bras bu'i dus su thugs ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:1988: ru lu 'bru brgyad mkha' 'gro ma brgyad /
NK015(ba)027:1989: spyir 'dus dpal chen po'i snying por bstan pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1990: ru lu bzlas brjod du shes pa gsum ste /
NK015(ba)027:1993: 'bru brgyad 'phros te bskul don byas shing sid+d+hi thob par bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:1995: 'bru brgyad snying khar gnas pa'i 'phros 'dus don gnyis dang tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:1996: gsum pa lha la 'phro 'du gtong ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:1997: bdag dang mdun gyi gzhal yas khang gi lha la
NK015(ba)027:1998: 'phro 'du 'gal me ltar byas te tshur 'dus pa'i
NK015(ba)027:2000: phar 'phros pa'i dus su mchod pa 'bul bar bsgom zhing bazla'o //
NK015(ba)027:2001: ru lu phrin las su shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2003: 'od zer dkar pos zhi ba'i las brtsam /
NK015(ba)027:2004: gsang sngags yi ge 'bru 'jam pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2008: mkhun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin dang /
NK015(ba)027:2009: 'od zer mthing nag gi drag po'i las brtsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2010: rdo rje srin po'i dur skad dang /
NK015(ba)027:2011: 'od zer ser nag gis mnan pa'i las brtsam mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin dang /
NK015(ba)027:2012: 'od zer dmar nag gis bzlog pa'i dus su de ltar brtsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2013: ru lu mchod par shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2014: ru lu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la /
NK015(ba)027:2015: phyi nang gsang gsum gyi mchod pa'i bye brag spros te mchod pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:2016: ru lu bshags par shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2017: bdag med phyogs bral gyi don ma rtogs ste /
NK015(ba)027:2018: nga dang bdag tu bzung ba'i dbang gis nyes skyon rnams /
NK015(ba)027:2019: bka' phyi nang gi lha srung dang /
NK015(ba)027:2020: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la ru lu 'bru brgyad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du spros te /
NK015(ba)027:2021: rol pa ye shes kyi 'od phung du gyur te bdag la tshur 'dus pas /
NK015(ba)027:2022: bdag gi nyes skyon byang zhing dag nas /
NK015(ba)027:2023: ye shes kyi sku la nag nog gi dri ma dang bral bas /
NK015(ba)027:2024: shel sgong phyis pa'am mu tig dag pa la dri ma med pa ltar /
NK015(ba)027:2025: shes pa'i rgyud gsal zhing dwang bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:2026: ru lu dngos grub tu shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2028: rang gi thugs ka nas ru lu 'bru brgyad ljang
NK015(ba)027:2029: dmar du 'phro zhing ye shes lha'i sku gsung thugs
NK015(ba)027:2030: kyi gnas su thim pas mnyes par byas nas /
NK015(ba)027:2031: mdun gyi lha'i thugs ka nas ru lu smug nag bsdu zhing /
NK015(ba)027:2032: bsgrub pa po'i lus ngag yid gsum la bsdus pas /
NK015(ba)027:2035: thugs skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2036: de yan chad bye brag tu shes pa'i bdun pa'i skabs ni /
NK015(ba)027:2037: phal cher ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor tshang ba'i
NK015(ba)027:2038: phyag rgya gcig pa gang rung gcig bdag gi thugs
NK015(ba)027:2040: dzapa khang gi bzlas pa ltar bya ba'i dus su'o //
NK015(ba)027:2043: sgrub pa po'i ru lu he ru ka'i thugs kar bstim /
NK015(ba)027:2045: zhes pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
NK015(ba)027:2046: dpal khrag 'thung gis lha ye shes dang las la
NK015(ba)027:2047: grub pa'i ril sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
NK015(ba)027:2048: dwangs ba rnams / sgrub pa po'i lus mgo mjug
NK015(ba)027:2049: tu bzhugs te dbyer med du gyur nas shin tu
NK015(ba)027:2050: yang bkrag gsal bar gyur pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2051: thun mong gi dngos grub chen po thob pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:2052: las la grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ni
NK015(ba)027:2053: sku mi bsdu bar 'od zer yon tan thams cad
NK015(ba)027:2054: bsdu ba'o // ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2055: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi rnam par
NK015(ba)027:2056: dag pa'i chos nyid stong pa nyid du 'dus ma
NK015(ba)027:2057: byas pa / mtshan ma'i spros pa ngang gis ma
NK015(ba)027:2058: dmigs pa gsal zhing sgrib byed med pa'i ngang du
NK015(ba)027:2059: rig pa nyid gdal bar btang ste bsgom pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:2060: don de la ni chos nyid kyi go bgo ba zhes kyang bya /
NK015(ba)027:2061: chos nyid kyi srung ba zhes kyang bya /
NK015(ba)027:2062: chos nyid kyi lta ba zhes kyang bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:2063: de dag ni rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa nor bu
NK015(ba)027:2064: lugs su ci bder byas pas mchog gi dngos grub
NK015(ba)027:2066: tshig bcad mi dgos te ru lu rang gis chog /
NK015(ba)027:2067: tshig bcad dang bskyed rim ni /
NK015(ba)027:2068: sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ste 'dir mi dgos //
NK015(ba)027:2069: rgyud lung man ngag gsum gyi bcud //
NK015(ba)027:2070: h'u k+aa ra dang pad+ma pas //
NK015(ba)027:2071: nyams kyis man ngag dril ba yi //
NK015(ba)027:2073: phyi rab skal ldan 'ga' zhig gi /
NK015(ba)027:2076: srog lus man chad nor zas kyi //
NK015(ba)027:2077: mnyes par byas la don 'di zhus //
NK015(ba)027:2078: rnyed nas khog pa'i snying ltar spos //
NK015(ba)027:2079: gsang ba'i dam tshig srog ltar bsrung //
NK015(ba)027:2080: nyes pa ci mchis 'phags pa bshags //
NK015(ba)027:2081: skal ldan rnams dang 'phrad par shog /
NK015(ba)027:2082: gsang ngo gsang ngo gsang ngo /
NK015(ba)027:2084: / 'di'i brgyud pa ni dam pa rin po che /
NK015(ba)027:2090: des rtsa sde spyan snga pa /
NK015(ba)027:2093: des dpal 'bar ba rdo rje dpal /
NK015(ba)027:2097: bsnyen pa gang byed kyang tshar nas /
NK015(ba)027:2100: sgeg mo brgyad mchong bsdus pa bya la /
NK015(ba)027:2101: thams cad ngo bo ces sogs kyis bstod la /
NK015(ba)027:2102: bde bar gshegs pa khyod ces sogs kyis dngos grub len la dmigs pa zhi ba'i skabs dang mthun /
NK015(ba)027:2103: de nas lag pas thal mo sbyar ba'am /
NK015(ba)027:2104: rnga dal thabs su brdung zhing /
NK015(ba)027:2105: h'u bdag ni rang rig ces sogs 'og gi bshags par bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:2106: spyi don gsum pa rjes lhag ma bya ba la /
NK015(ba)027:2111: spyir pad+ma dbang chen gyi gtso bor byas pa yin te /
NK015(ba)027:2112: 'on kyang 'dir sgyu 'phrul la sbyar kyang rung /
NK015(ba)027:2113: de yang tshogs kyi mchod pa'am /
NK015(ba)027:2115: phrin las chen po brtsams pa'i dus su lan re tsam bya'o /
NK015(ba)027:2117: / 'di yang dang po rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma /
NK015(ba)027:2119: phud kyi mchod pa bstan ste /
NK015(ba)027:2120: badz+ra he ru ka ni khrag 'thung chen po lnga la sogs pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:2121: badz+ra d+aa ka mkha' 'gro pho ste lha chen nyer gcig la sogs pa /
NK015(ba)027:2122: d+aa ki ni mo ste dbang mo nyer brgyad lta bu rnams so //
NK015(ba)027:2123: de rnams mchod pa'i cho ga ni /
NK015(ba)027:2124: go rim brgyad la sogs pa dgos pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2125: sems can bsrung don du bder gshegs rigs lnga la sogs pa mchod /
NK015(ba)027:2126: h'u zhi khro ces pa nas /
NK015(ba)027:2127: dza h'u bam ho'i bar gyis dkyil 'khor gyis lha dbyings nas bzhengs su gsol te spyan drangs pa'o //
NK015(ba)027:2128: pho brang gzhal yas ces pa nas gshegs su gsol ces pa'i bar gyis kyang spyan drangs so /
NK015(ba)027:2130: / +aa ral+li sogs bzhugs gsol gyis mchod cing gshegs pa'i bar bstan ste /
NK015(ba)027:2131: mdor na 'di yan chad phud kyi mchod pa ste /
NK015(ba)027:2132: las gzhung dang sbyar la bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:2133: de nas lhag ma'i cho ga dngos ni /
NK015(ba)027:2134: bdag nyid skad cig gis rta mgrin du gsal bar byas la /
NK015(ba)027:2135: ta ki r+aa tsa ces pa nas /
NK015(ba)027:2136: h+aum h+aum phata phata ces pa'i bar brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:2137: lhag ma la dbang ba rnams rang dbang med par 'ong bar bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2138: de nas rta mgrin gyi mu tra bca' la /
NK015(ba)027:2139: sngags brjod pas thams cad dbang du 'dus par bsam /
NK015(ba)027:2140: de nas he ru ka'i phyag rgya ste /
NK015(ba)027:2141: thod rlon gyi phyag rgya bca' la sngags brjod pas
NK015(ba)027:2142: lhag ma la dbang ba de rnams sngon dpal chen
NK015(ba)027:2143: po'i dam la btags pa'i dam tshig dran nas ci
NK015(ba)027:2144: bgyis bka' nyan par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2145: de nas zas zos pa'i lhag ma rnams bdud rtsi'i kha chus btab ste /
NK015(ba)027:2146: ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi ljags la h+r+aihdakara po
NK015(ba)027:2147: bsam pa la bdud rtsi'i char byung bas gtor ma
NK015(ba)027:2148: la phog pas bdud rtsir gyur par dmigs la /
NK015(ba)027:2149: +aahmh'u ush+tsi ces sngags nyer gcig gam bdun bazla'o //
NK015(ba)027:2150: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa ces pas sngags kyis bdud rtsir brlab /
NK015(ba)027:2151: de nas rang gi lce la blang ba'am blang bar bsam la /
NK015(ba)027:2152: 'dir gzhung du ma bshad kyang badz+ra d+aa ka d+aa
NK015(ba)027:2153: ki ni pra tits+tsha i mam b+ha ling+ta h'u phata
NK015(ba)027:2154: ka ram kh+aa hi la sogs pa brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:2155: rang gi zhal nas h+r+aihls bdud rtsi'i char byung nas
NK015(ba)027:2156: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi zhal du song ba dang
NK015(ba)027:2157: / mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyid kyi lce rdo rje'i
NK015(ba)027:2158: sbu gu can gyis gtor ma gsol bar bsam pa
NK015(ba)027:2159: / dang / gtor ma de nyid dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag tu dmigs nas gsol bar bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2160: de nas rta mchog dbang gi rgyal po ces pa brjod la /
NK015(ba)027:2161: nam mkhar 'gro ma rnams ces pa'i rting la /
NK015(ba)027:2164: phrin las mdzod ces pa'i rting la /
NK015(ba)027:2165: thugs dang 'gal bar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK015(ba)027:2166: ces pa ni bshags pa bya ces pa'i don no //
NK015(ba)027:2167: phrin las bcol ces pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2168: rang gi yid la brnag pa'i dgra bgegs kyi ming nas phyung la /
NK015(ba)027:2170: ces pa yid las byung ba'i ming nas brjod pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2171: gzhan phrin las bzhi gang yin pa dang sbyar ro //
NK015(ba)027:2172: lhag ma'i gnas bdun nam brgyad po'i de dag thams cad kyang /
NK015(ba)027:2173: rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro la 'dus pas thams cad kyang rdzogs pa'i rting la /
NK015(ba)027:2174: h'u sarba badz+ra d+aa ka d+aa ki ni pra tits+tsha ho /
NK015(ba)027:2175: i dam b+ha ling+ta h'u phata kha ram kh+aa hi la sogs pa sbyar ro //
NK015(ba)027:2176: rak+ta sbreng ba de nyid kyi tshe rak+ta brlab pa la bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:2177: ging chen bco brgyad la pho dgu smos pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2178: mo dgu smos pa ni gtso bo dang gtso mo /
NK015(ba)027:2179: de nas brten ma ma gtogs pas gong ma rnams
NK015(ba)027:2180: ni sngon dpal chen po'i dam btsal ba'i mkha' 'gro
NK015(ba)027:2181: yin la / brten ma ni slob dpon pad+mas dam btsal ba yin te /
NK015(ba)027:2182: sa de nyid du bsngosa na brten mas mi thob pas srin mo za lam gom pa bdun cu'am /
NK015(ba)027:2183: bdun la sogs pa phyir bsnur te brten ma mchod do //
NK015(ba)027:2185: lag pa thal mo gar thabs su bskor la /
NK015(ba)027:2186: e sa be sa'i sngags brjod la kun snyan gsan dbab bo //
NK015(ba)027:2187: yang lag pa bskor zhing thal mo brdab la /
NK015(ba)027:2188: e +aa ral+li'i sngags kyis spyan drang ngo //
NK015(ba)027:2189: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bca' la ta ki ra tsa ces brjod cing srog snying drang /
NK015(ba)027:2190: ces pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas h+r+ai dmar
NK015(ba)027:2191: po byung nas rang gis thugs kar thim par bsam
NK015(ba)027:2192: zhing / so so nas nga ni mi srin ma yin no //
NK015(ba)027:2193: tshangs ma yin ces pa la sogs pa brjod cing /
NK015(ba)027:2194: sngon gyis dam tshig dran nas las ci bcol byed par bsam /
NK015(ba)027:2195: rta mgrin gyi phyag rgyas dbang du bsdu'o //
NK015(ba)027:2196: de nas h'u sarba d+aa ka d+aa ki ni ces pas mchod /
NK015(ba)027:2199: dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag kun gyis so //
NK015(ba)027:2200: yang na dbang mo'i rang sngags te /
NK015(ba)027:2201: ma nu rak+sha si b+h+yo kh+aa hi la sogs pas so //
NK015(ba)027:2203: b+h+yo mi srin mo dang tshangs ma dang /
NK015(ba)027:2205: sngon tshe dpal chen he ru kas /
NK015(ba)027:2206: ces pa gsang snying nas byung bas phrin las bcol la /
NK015(ba)027:2207: sdang ba'i dgra thul la sogs pa brjod do //
NK015(ba)027:2208: yang na sngon tshe ces pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2209: mi srin mo dang ces pa mi brjod de /
NK015(ba)027:2210: sdang ba'i dgra thul ces pa la sogs pa brjod kyang rung ngo //
NK015(ba)027:2211: de nas de dag gi rang gi ci 'dod pa'i
NK015(ba)027:2212: las rnams bsgrub par bsam zhing ya hi gats+tshasa gshegs
NK015(ba)027:2213: su gsol / bsdus pa ni gtor lung nas byung ba ci lta ba bzhin no //
NK015(ba)027:2215: h'u zhi khro'i tshogs 'dus ye shes dpal gyi 'khor //
NK015(ba)027:2216: dpal chen he ru ka ni dbyings nas bzhengs //
NK015(ba)027:2217: dam tshig bden pa'i gzhung srang theg chen 'debs //
NK015(ba)027:2218: dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po bzhengs su gsol //
NK015(ba)027:2219: chags pa'i yum chen gsang chen sdud pa mo //
NK015(ba)027:2220: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i pho brang mchog /
NK015(ba)027:2221: nyon mongs 'khor bar mi gtong bdag nyid ma //
NK015(ba)027:2222: rigs kyi yum rnams gsang ba'i dbyings nas bzhengs //
NK015(ba)027:2223: dpal chen rngam brjid che ba'i khyad par las //
NK015(ba)027:2224: steng 'og phyogs mtshams so so'i bdud 'dul ba //
NK015(ba)027:2225: gtum chen rab 'bar 'jom byed khro bo bcu //
NK015(ba)027:2226: ye shes rngam pa'i tshogs rnams dbyings nas bzhengs //
NK015(ba)027:2227: dpal chen thugs kyi sprul pa lha mo'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)027:2228: ha dang he las bskyed pa'i khyad par las //
NK015(ba)027:2229: za byed chen po koo r+ai brgyad rnams dang //
NK015(ba)027:2230: sgrol byed chen po mu ka brgyad rnams dang //
NK015(ba)027:2231: bdud bzhi sgo gcod ye shes sgo ma rnam bzhi dang //
NK015(ba)027:2232: dpal gyi bka' sdod dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad //
NK015(ba)027:2233: thugs dam brda la dgongs te bzhengs su gsol //
NK015(ba)027:2236: pho brang gzhal yas yum gyi mkha' gsang nas //
NK015(ba)027:2237: rak+ta rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni rdzing ltar 'khrugs //
NK015(ba)027:2238: mang sa gal chen tshogs ni thang mar bting //
NK015(ba)027:2239: dmar chen ar+g+ham tshogs mi mtsho ltar bskyil //
NK015(ba)027:2240: zhing chen gsar rnying tshogs ni sti rar bcag /
NK015(ba)027:2241: thod rus skam rlon tshogs ni mkha' ltar brtsigs //
NK015(ba)027:2242: tsit+ta gur gyi tshogs ni gangs ltar spungs //
NK015(ba)027:2243: bro mchog sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma la //
NK015(ba)027:2244: sta na g+ha na'i tshogs ni dbyings nas rol //
NK015(ba)027:2245: dpal chen he ru ka ni dbyings nas bzhengs //
NK015(ba)027:2246: d+aa ki nag po'i tshogs ni me ltar 'bar //
NK015(ba)027:2247: ma mo nag mo'i tshogs ni mun ltar gtib //
NK015(ba)027:2248: rta mchog rol pa'i tshogs ni rta skad bzhed //
NK015(ba)027:2249: phra men rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni skar ltar 'khrugs //
NK015(ba)027:2250: pho nya mgyog ma'i tshogs ni glog ltar 'gyu //
NK015(ba)027:2251: ci bgyis bka' nyan tshogs ni gdugs ltar bskor //
NK015(ba)027:2252: rnal 'byor longs spyod che la gshegs su gsol /
NK015(ba)027:2255: yi ge brgya pas bzod par bzhes //
NK015(ba)027:2256: mdor na de yan chad phud kyis mchod ste gzhung dang sbyar ro //
NK015(ba)027:2257: lha gang bsgom kyang sku mdog dmar po bsgyur yang nyan gsungs //
NK015(ba)027:2258: de nas lhag ma'i cho ga dngos te /
NK015(ba)027:2259: skad cig gi bdag nyid dpal rta mgrin gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la /
NK015(ba)027:2260: lhag ma la dbang ba rnams spyan drangs bar bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:2262: dpal gyis bka' sdod ci bgyis bka' gnyan tshogs //
NK015(ba)027:2263: gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis //
NK015(ba)027:2264: zhing chen sgrol mdzad ging chen bco brgyad dang //
NK015(ba)027:2265: lang+ka'i tshogs dang dur khrod bdag mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2266: dbang chen grags pa'i ma mo bdun rnams dang //
NK015(ba)027:2267: sti ra za bar byed pa'i sring mo bzhi //
NK015(ba)027:2268: gnod byed snying nas 'dren pa'i 'bar ma brgyad //
NK015(ba)027:2269: phyi nang las byed pho nya drug cu bzhi //
NK015(ba)027:2270: gzhan yang steng 'og phyogs mtshams so so nas //
NK015(ba)027:2271: dbang phyug chen po'i chung ma nyi shu brgyad //
NK015(ba)027:2272: thugs dam brda la dgongs te gnas 'dir gshegs //
NK015(ba)027:2274: b+h+yo e +aa ral+li dzahbar gyis spyan 'dren /
NK015(ba)027:2275: de nas phud dang lhag ma bsres la rang gi
NK015(ba)027:2276: kha chus gdab ste ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi
NK015(ba)027:2277: ljags la h+r+aihdakara po la bdud rtsi'i char byung bas
NK015(ba)027:2278: / gtor ma la phog pas bdud rtsir gyur par bsam la /
NK015(ba)027:2280: de nas ush+tsi ta'i sngags kyis dag par bya /
NK015(ba)027:2281: +aahmh'u ush+tsi ta thod rlon gyi phyag rgyas dam la btags /
NK015(ba)027:2283: mu sha kra ma sa man h'u phata /
NK015(ba)027:2284: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla /
NK015(ba)027:2286: badz+ra a ti ti sta sa mam zhes brjod pas bdud rtsi chen por byin gyis brlabs /
NK015(ba)027:2287: de nas rnal 'byor pa'i lce la lan gsum blangs ba'am blang bar bsam /
NK015(ba)027:2288: de nas t+aa ki ra tsa'i phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'di brjod do //
NK015(ba)027:2306: sarba badz+ra nan d+aak+ki ni h+r+ai da ya h'u h'u phata phata zhes brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:2307: lhag ma la dbang ba rnams rang dbang med par thul gyis 'ong bar bsam mo //
NK015(ba)027:2308: de nas rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya spyi bor bcing ba /
NK015(ba)027:2309: pad+ma d+ha ra h+r+aih pad+ma ba mu kha /
NK015(ba)027:2310: pad+ma ta kri ta h+ya g+h+ri wa h'u h'u h'u /
NK015(ba)027:2311: zhes pas dbang du bsdu zhing zil gyis mnan no //
NK015(ba)027:2312: de nas phrin las bcol lo //
NK015(ba)027:2313: badz+ra he ru ka'i phyag rgya bca' la thod rlon gyi phyag rgyas dam la btags /
NK015(ba)027:2314: badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru kah ma h+aa tsan+da sarba dush+tana sa ma ya mu tra /
NK015(ba)027:2316: +aa be sha ya h'u zhes brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:2317: sngon dpal chen po'i dam la btags pa'i dam tshig
NK015(ba)027:2318: rjes su dran nas ci bgyis bka' nyan par bsam
NK015(ba)027:2321: h'u badz+ra d+aa ka d+aa ki ni pra tits+tsha ho /
NK015(ba)027:2322: e dam b+ha ling+ta h'u phata kh+aa hi la sogs pas brjod pas /
NK015(ba)027:2323: rang gi zhal nas h+r+aihls bdud rtsi'i char mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi zhal du song ba dang /
NK015(ba)027:2324: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ljags rdo rje'i sbu gu can gyis gtor ma gsol bar bsam pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2325: gtor ma de nyid dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag tu dmigs nas gsol bar bsgom mo //
NK015(ba)027:2326: de nas pha 'bab kyi lhag mas rdo rje mkha'
NK015(ba)027:2327: 'gro ma rnams spyan drangs zhing mchod pa ni 'di
NK015(ba)027:2328: skad do // rta mchog dbang gi rgyal po dang //
NK015(ba)027:2329: yum chen rdo rje ral gcig mas //
NK015(ba)027:2331: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi bskor ba ni //
NK015(ba)027:2332: rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ma rnams //
NK015(ba)027:2333: yi dwags stan la yang dag bzhugs //
NK015(ba)027:2335: skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan //
NK015(ba)027:2336: gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdig byed cing //
NK015(ba)027:2337: sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang //
NK015(ba)027:2338: rkang dang tshil bu zas spyod rnams //
NK015(ba)027:2339: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor srung ba ste //
NK015(ba)027:2340: dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed //
NK015(ba)027:2341: gsod par byed dang phrog par byed //
NK015(ba)027:2342: shar gyi nam mkhar 'gro ma rnams //
NK015(ba)027:2345: 'dir gshegs bka' yi gtor ma 'di long la //
NK015(ba)027:2346: bdag cag rnal 'byor bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod //
NK015(ba)027:2347: lhag ma'i gnas bdun nam brgyad po dag rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro 'du bas /
NK015(ba)027:2348: thams cad kyang rdzogs pa'i rting la /
NK015(ba)027:2349: h'u badz+ra d+aa ka d+aa ki ni pra tits+tsha la sogs pa spyir sbyar /
NK015(ba)027:2350: rak+ta sbreng zhing thugs dang 'gal bar gyur pa mthol lo bshags /
NK015(ba)027:2351: ces btags te bshags pa bya'o //
NK015(ba)027:2353: yid la brnag pa'i dgra bgegs kyi ming nas byung la /
NK015(ba)027:2354: de bsgral ba'i phrin las mdzod /
NK015(ba)027:2355: ces rang gi yid la byung bas brjod pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2356: gzhan yang phrin las bzhi gang yin dang sbyar ro //
NK015(ba)027:2357: gzi byed ma dang 'bar byed ma /
NK015(ba)027:2359: / 'jig byed ma dang bong bu'i mgo //
NK015(ba)027:2362: / 'dir gshegs bka'i gtor ma 'di long la //
NK015(ba)027:2363: bdag cag rnal 'byor bcol pa'i phrin rak+ta phrin las /
NK015(ba)027:2364: chags chen ma dang chags bral ma /
NK015(ba)027:2367: nub tu nam mkhar 'gro 'dir gshegs bka'i bdag cag rnal 'byor rak+ta /
NK015(ba)027:2369: sna tshogs lus la bsrung ba mo //
NK015(ba)027:2370: gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag phrog /
NK015(ba)027:2371: byang tu nam mkha' 'gro 'dir bdag cag rnal 'byor
NK015(ba)027:2372: bya rog gdung ni mi gdug cing 'jigs pa'i mig
NK015(ba)027:2373: dang 'jigs pa'i gdong shar lho nam mkha' yi dwags
NK015(ba)027:2375: sna tshogs gis ni gdong 'dzin cing //
NK015(ba)027:2376: lag par gri dang khrag gzhong thogs //
NK015(ba)027:2377: mchog tu sha dang khrag la za /
NK015(ba)027:2379: / 'dir gshegs bdag cag rnal bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma //
NK015(ba)027:2380: khros pa khyi dang phag gi gdong //
NK015(ba)027:2381: lho nub nam mkha' gsus pa che la lto 'phyang rnams /
NK015(ba)027:2383: / 'dir gshegs bdag cag rnal rnga mang bong bu'i gdong 'dzin ma //
NK015(ba)027:2384: khros pa ra dang byi la'i gdong //
NK015(ba)027:2385: nub byang nam mkhar 'gro ma rnams //
NK015(ba)027:2386: rgyu ma'i mgo nas za bar byed /
NK015(ba)027:2388: / 'dir gshegs bka'i bdag cag rnal keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste //
NK015(ba)027:2389: khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klub //
NK015(ba)027:2390: byang shar nam mkhar 'gro ma rnams /
NK015(ba)027:2392: / 'dir gshegs bka'i gtor ma bdag cag rnal 'byor lto 'phyang po la bum pa 'dzin //
NK015(ba)027:2393: phan tshun 'thad par rtsod pa ni //
NK015(ba)027:2394: ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams /
NK015(ba)027:2399: / 'dir bdag cag srin po bum rna shar du ste //
NK015(ba)027:2400: lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po'o //
NK015(ba)027:2401: rnam par bsgyur ba nub tu ste //
NK015(ba)027:2402: byang du 'bod sgrog chen po che //
NK015(ba)027:2403: rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyed rnams kyang //
NK015(ba)027:2406: / 'dir gshegs bka'i bdag cag rnal dpal chen khrag 'thung yab yum la //
NK015(ba)027:2409: la la mdzes sdud 'od dang ldan //
NK015(ba)027:2410: la la mi sdug srin mo'i gzugs //
NK015(ba)027:2411: la la sha zan gsus pa che //
NK015(ba)027:2412: la la khrag 'thung mchu dmar ma //
NK015(ba)027:2413: la la mchu rnon rus 'cha' ma //
NK015(ba)027:2414: la la sder chen snying 'byin ma //
NK015(ba)027:2415: la la bum chen dpung sdud ma //
NK015(ba)027:2416: la la sgeg byed skya ga'i gdong //
NK015(ba)027:2417: shugs 'gro chen mo khyed rnams kyang //
NK015(ba)027:2420: / 'dir gshegs bdag cag rnal bcom ldan dpal chen yab yum la //
NK015(ba)027:2422: ging chen tshogs kyis bskor ba ni //
NK015(ba)027:2424: pho dgu mo dgu smos pa ni tso bo dang gtso mo'i /
NK015(ba)027:2425: khro mo'i rgyal po badz+ra ging ka ra //
NK015(ba)027:2426: khro bo chen po khams gsum mi gdong spu gu can //
NK015(ba)027:2427: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje srin po dang //
NK015(ba)027:2428: rdo rje 'byung po dang ni rdo rje ro lang dang //
NK015(ba)027:2429: rdo rje shwa na dang ni rdo rje dus mtshams dang //
NK015(ba)027:2430: rdo rje 'chi bdag chen po la sogs pa //
NK015(ba)027:2431: de dang sbyor ba'i yum chen mo //
NK015(ba)027:2432: stong gsum dbugs kyis 'geng pa chen mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2433: khams gsum g.yab mos 'debs ba chen mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2434: gar thabs glog bzhin 'gyu ba chen mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2435: gzugs med glog bzhin 'gyu ba chen mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2436: stong gsum thugs rjes 'dren byed chen mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2437: rna nyan phra ma sel byed chen mo dang //
NK015(ba)027:2438: tshogs kyi phyag tshang mnyes byed chen mo la sogs pa //
NK015(ba)027:2439: rdo rje byi sbu pho mo 'khor bcas rnams //
NK015(ba)027:2442: / 'dir gshegs bdag cag rnal 'byor rak+ta sbreng ba la sogs 'gres //
NK015(ba)027:2443: bcom ldan dpal chen yab yum la //
NK015(ba)027:2445: lang+ka'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni //
NK015(ba)027:2446: nga ni lang+ka'i bdag po ste //
NK015(ba)027:2447: rdo rje'i dam tshig yang dag ldan //
NK015(ba)027:2448: de bzhin snying po'i dam tshig gis //
NK015(ba)027:2450: nga ni dur khrod bdag po ste //
NK015(ba)027:2451: sgrub pa'i dam tshig de bzhin bsgrub pa'i dur khrod chogs rnams nga ni rig pa'i rgyal po ste //
NK015(ba)027:2452: rtogs pa'i dam tshig de bzhin rtogs pa'i rig pa'i /
NK015(ba)027:2453: rdo rje'i sku ni cir yang sprul //
NK015(ba)027:2454: rdo rje'i gsung ni cir yang sgrogs //
NK015(ba)027:2455: rdo rje'i thugs ni cir yang lus lus pa med pa rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol /
NK015(ba)027:2456: khyed rnams la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK015(ba)027:2457: phyi'i mchod pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs dang /
NK015(ba)027:2458: nang gi mchod pa gti mug sha'i ri bo /
NK015(ba)027:2459: zhe sdang rus pa'i phung po /
NK015(ba)027:2461: dug gsum gyi mchod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams dang //
NK015(ba)027:2462: bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang /
NK015(ba)027:2463: gsang ba'i mchod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams /
NK015(ba)027:2466: mnyes rab kyi phul dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2467: phrin las su bcol ba ni /
NK015(ba)027:2468: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu ma thob kyi bar du /
NK015(ba)027:2469: 'khor dang longs spyod thams cad dar zhing rgyas pa dang bde skyid phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2470: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la chos kyi skal pa chen pos khyab par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2471: bdud dpung thams cad bcom par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2472: bgegs dpung thams cad brlag par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2473: nyams pa thams cad skong bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2474: bar chad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2475: 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2476: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2477: sa gzhi thams cad la yang byin chags par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2478: gnas khang thams cad bkra shis par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2479: bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)027:2480: ces brjod la gtor ma bskyang ngo //
NK015(ba)027:2483: sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i las rim gsal bar byed pa gser gyi phreng ba 'di /
NK015(ba)027:2484: bu 'bor ri khrod du sbyar ba re zhig rdzogs so //
NK015(ba)027:2488: ru lu gong ma ma chen brgyad //
NK015(ba)027:2489: ru lu 'og ma phran men brgyad //
NK015(ba)027:2490: h'u ni sgo ma bzhi'i ngang //
NK015(ba)027:2491: b+h+yo ni dbang mo nyer brgyad dang //
NK015(ba)027:2492: h'u ni thams cad dbyings su sdud //
